FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <3 StartTime="128870" EndTime="130946" PlainText="(sonar pings)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <4 StartTime="132415" EndTime="135665" PlainText="Okay. Take her up and over the bow rail." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <5 StartTime="135751" EndTime="140828" PlainText="Okay, Mir 2, we're going over the bow. Stay with us." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <6 StartTime="144844" EndTime="146920" PlainText="(sonar pings)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <7 StartTime="165740" EndTime="167816" PlainText="(mechanical whirring)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <8 StartTime="173915" EndTime="176121" PlainText="Okay, quiet. We're rolling." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <9 StartTime="176209" EndTime="180041" PlainText="Seeing her coming out of the darkness like a ghost ship..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <10 StartTime="180129" EndTime="181921" PlainText="...still gets me every time." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <11 StartTime="182006" EndTime="186798" PlainText="To see the sad ruin of the great ship sitting here..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <12 StartTime="186886" EndTime="192556" PlainText="...where she landed at 2:30 in the morning of April 15, 1912,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <13 StartTime="192600" EndTime="194806" PlainText="...after her long fall..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <14 StartTime="195853" EndTime="197929" PlainText="...from the world above." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <15 StartTime="198689" EndTime="200812" PlainText="You are so full of shit, boss!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <16 StartTime="202276" EndTime="204269" PlainText="(mechanical whirring)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <17 StartTime="204362" EndTime="206438" PlainText="(sonar pinging)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <18 StartTime="230054" EndTime="234134" PlainText="Dive six - here we are again on the deck of Titanic." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <19 StartTime="234267" EndTime="240352" PlainText="2 1/2 miles down, 3,821 meters." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <20 StartTime="240439" EndTime="243855" PlainText="The pressure outside is 3 1/2 tons per square inch." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <21 StartTime="243943" EndTime="246351" PlainText="These windows are nine inches thick." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <22 StartTime="246445" EndTime="250443" PlainText="If they go, it's sayonara in two microseconds." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <23 StartTime="250533" EndTime="253238" PlainText="All right. Enough of that bullshit." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <24 StartTime="266966" EndTime="270335" PlainText="Put her down on the roof of the officers' quarters." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <25 StartTime="270511" EndTime="271674" PlainText="Sure." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <26 StartTime="271762" EndTime="273470" PlainText="Okay, Mir 2." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <27 StartTime="273556" EndTime="277554" PlainText="We've landed on the grand staircase. You guys set to launch?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <28 StartTime="277643" EndTime="280313" PlainText="Yeah. launching Dunkin now. Go, Charlie." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <29 StartTime="288154" EndTime="290561" PlainText="- Tether out. - Tether out." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <30 StartTime="290656" EndTime="294820" PlainText="Okay, Brock, we're dropping down along the hull." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <31 StartTime="295995" EndTime="300704" PlainText="Roger that. Okay, drop down and go into the first-class gangway door." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <32 StartTime="300792" EndTime="304920" PlainText="I want you guys working the ''D'' deck, reception and the dining saloon." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <33 StartTime="305004" EndTime="306913" PlainText="Copy that." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <34 StartTime="313137" EndTime="314845" PlainText="- Tether out. - Tether out." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <35 StartTime="314931" EndTime="317054" PlainText="- Now left. - I'm coming left." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <36 StartTime="324482" EndTime="327103" PlainText="(Brock) Snoop Dog is on the move." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <37 StartTime="327193" EndTime="329684" PlainText="We're headed down the stairwell." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <38 StartTime="331656" EndTime="333814" PlainText="Okay, Lewis. Drop down to ''B'' deck." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <39 StartTime="333908" EndTime="335188" PlainText="Okay. ''A'' deck." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <40 StartTime="335284" EndTime="337360" PlainText="(Lewis) Give me some rope, Captain." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <41 StartTime="337453" EndTime="338484" PlainText="''B'' deck. Get in there." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <42 StartTime="376742" EndTime="379068" PlainText="(Brock) Watch the doorframe." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <43 StartTime="379162" EndTime="380953" PlainText="I see it. I got it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <44 StartTime="381038" EndTime="382533" PlainText="(banging)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <45 StartTime="382623" EndTime="384581" PlainText="(mechanical whirring)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <46 StartTime="384667" EndTime="386327" PlainText="(cracking)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <47 StartTime="386419" EndTime="388376" PlainText="We're good... Just chill, boss." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <48 StartTime="402727" EndTime="404636" PlainText="(Brock) Make your turn." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <49 StartTime="404729" EndTime="407849" PlainText="- (Lewis) Cable out, Captain. - Make your turn." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <50 StartTime="407940" EndTime="410348" PlainText="Brock, we're at the piano. You copy?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <51 StartTime="410443" EndTime="412519" PlainText="(Brock) Okay, copy that." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <52 StartTime="419702" EndTime="422240" PlainText="(Brock) Right there, that's it!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <53 StartTime="422330" EndTime="425533" PlainText="- That's the bedroom door! - I see it... I see it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <54 StartTime="434383" EndTime="435628" PlainText="We're in!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <55 StartTime="435718" EndTime="438553" PlainText="We're in, baby, we're there!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <56 StartTime="438638" EndTime="441010" PlainText="(Brock) That's Hockley's bed." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <57 StartTime="441098" EndTime="443768" PlainText="That's where the son of a bitch slept." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <58 StartTime="449106" EndTime="451942" PlainText="(Lewis) Somebody left the water running." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <59 StartTime="452026" EndTime="454695" PlainText="Hold it. Go back to the right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <60 StartTime="460827" EndTime="463578" PlainText="That wardrobe door... Get closer." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <61 StartTime="463663" EndTime="467114" PlainText="- You smelling something, boss? - I wanna see what's under it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <62 StartTime="467208" EndTime="468702" PlainText="Gimme my hands, man." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <63 StartTime="468793" EndTime="470252" PlainText="(mechanical whirring)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <64 StartTime="474090" EndTime="475750" PlainText="All right...!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <65 StartTime="477301" EndTime="481050" PlainText="- Take it easy. It might come apart. - Okay." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <66 StartTime="481139" EndTime="482419" PlainText="Go! Go, go, go!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <67 StartTime="482515" EndTime="484554" PlainText="Flip it over, flip it over. Go." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <68 StartTime="484642" EndTime="487394" PlainText="Keep going. Go, go, go." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <69 StartTime="487478" EndTime="488676" PlainText="Okay. Drop it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <70 StartTime="497572" EndTime="501071" PlainText="Oh, baby, baby... Are you seeing this, boss?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <71 StartTime="503161" EndTime="505237" PlainText="It's payday, boys." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <72 StartTime="517592" EndTime="519668" PlainText="(cheering)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <73 StartTime="521637" EndTime="523464" PlainText="Ka-ching!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <74 StartTime="523556" EndTime="525264" PlainText="We did it, Bobby!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <75 StartTime="525349" EndTime="528434" PlainText="(Lewis) Oh, yeah! Who's the man!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <76 StartTime="528519" EndTime="530393" PlainText="Who's the best, baby?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <77 StartTime="530480" EndTime="531938" PlainText="Say it, say it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <78 StartTime="532023" EndTime="533980" PlainText="You are, Lewis." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <79 StartTime="534066" EndTime="536225" PlainText="(loud buzzing)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <80 StartTime="536319" EndTime="538358" PlainText="- Bobby, my cigar. - Right here." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <81 StartTime="538446" EndTime="540522" PlainText="(cheering)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <82 StartTime="545912" EndTime="548070" PlainText="Okay, crack her open." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <83 StartTime="550166" EndTime="554080" PlainText="- let me get around. Hang on. - You getting it?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <84 StartTime="577693" EndTime="579651" PlainText="Shit." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <85 StartTime="580321" EndTime="582112" PlainText="No diamond." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <86 StartTime="582198" EndTime="584155" PlainText="You know, boss,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <87 StartTime="584242" EndTime="589449" PlainText="...the same thing happened to Geraldo, and his career never recovered." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <88 StartTime="591290" EndTime="593330" PlainText="Turn the camera off." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <89 StartTime="593417" EndTime="597747" PlainText="Brock, the partners would like to know how it's going." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <90 StartTime="597839" EndTime="601788" PlainText="Hey, Dave. Barry. Hi. look, it wasn't in the safe, but hey..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <91 StartTime="601884" EndTime="605929" PlainText="...don't worry about it. There's plenty of places it could be." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <92 StartTime="606013" EndTime="608172" PlainText="The floor debris, the mother's room..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <93 StartTime="608266" EndTime="610757" PlainText="- Purser's safe on ''C'' deck. - Jimmy Hoffa's briefcase." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <94 StartTime="610852" EndTime="612560" PlainText="(Brock) A dozen other places." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <95 StartTime="612645" EndTime="615979" PlainText="You've got to trust my instincts. I know we're close." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <96 StartTime="616065" EndTime="619648" PlainText="We just got to go through a process of elimination." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <97 StartTime="619735" EndTime="621811" PlainText="Hang on a second." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <98 StartTime="623865" EndTime="625941" PlainText="let me see that." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <99 StartTime="625992" EndTime="627949" PlainText="We might have something here, guys." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <100 StartTime="629537" EndTime="632242" PlainText="Where's the photo of the necklace?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <101 StartTime="632290" EndTime="635041" PlainText="- We'll call you right back. - Holy..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <102 StartTime="645011" EndTime="647087" PlainText="I'll be goddamned." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <103 StartTime="648306" EndTime="653217" PlainText="(TV) Treasure hunter Brock Lovett is best known for finding Spanish gold..." FormattedText="{(TV) Treasure hunter Brock Lovett is best known for finding Spanish gold... Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <104 StartTime="653311" EndTime="656265" PlainText="It's okay. I'll feed you in a minute." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <105 StartTime="656355" EndTime="661563" PlainText="He's chartered a Russian sub to reach the most famous wreck of all: Titanic." FormattedText="{He's chartered a Russian sub to reach the most famous wreck of all: Titanic. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <106 StartTime="661652" EndTime="665816" PlainText="He's with us live via satellite from the Keldysh in the North Atlantic." FormattedText="{He's with us live via satellite from the Keldysh in the North Atlantic. FormattedText="{...the nobility, the band playing and all that. FormattedText="{We're using robot technology to go further into the wreck... Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <113 StartTime="685968" EndTime="689254" PlainText="You're at the centre of a controversy..." Many are calling you a grave robber." FormattedText="{...over salvage rights, and ethics. Many are calling you a grave robber. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <115 StartTime="693559" EndTime="696015" PlainText="Nobody called the recovery of King Tut ''grave robbing''." FormattedText="{Nobody called the recovery of King Tut ''grave robbing''. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <116 StartTime="696103" EndTime="698855" PlainText="- What is it? - Turn that up, dear." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <117 StartTime="698940" EndTime="701810" PlainText="I have museum-trained experts here..." FormattedText="{I have museum-trained experts here... Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <118 StartTime="701901" EndTime="704570" PlainText="...making sure these relics are treated properly." FormattedText="{look at this drawing we found just today. FormattedText="{A piece of paper that's been underwater for 84 years... Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <121 StartTime="711577" EndTime="715361" PlainText="...and my team were able to preserve it intact." FormattedText="{...and my team were able to preserve it intact. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <122 StartTime="715456" EndTime="720533" PlainText="Should this have remained unseen at the bottom of the ocean for eternity?" FormattedText="{Should this have remained unseen at the bottom of the ocean for eternity? Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <123 StartTime="720628" EndTime="722206" PlainText="I'll be goddamned." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <124 StartTime="725258" EndTime="728342" PlainText="Brock! There's a satellite call for you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <125 StartTime="728427" EndTime="732425" PlainText="Bobby, we're launching. You see these submersibles going in?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <126 StartTime="732515" EndTime="735184" PlainText="Trust me, buddy. You wanna take this call." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <127 StartTime="736477" EndTime="738517" PlainText="This better be good." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <128 StartTime="738604" EndTime="741689" PlainText="You gotta speak up. She's kinda old." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <129 StartTime="741774" EndTime="743601" PlainText="Great." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <130 StartTime="743693" EndTime="746896" PlainText="This is Brock Lovett. How can I help you, Mrs...?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <131 StartTime="746988" EndTime="749194" PlainText="Calvert. Rose Calvert." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <132 StartTime="749282" EndTime="751155" PlainText="Mrs. Calvert?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <133 StartTime="751242" EndTime="756616" PlainText="I was just wondering if you'd found the ''Heart of the Ocean'', Mr. Lovett." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <134 StartTime="758374" EndTime="760699" PlainText="I said you wanted to take the call." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <135 StartTime="762837" EndTime="765375" PlainText="All right. You have my attention, Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <136 StartTime="765465" EndTime="768501" PlainText="Can you tell us who the woman in the picture is?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <137 StartTime="768593" EndTime="770170" PlainText="Oh, yes." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <138 StartTime="770261" EndTime="772966" PlainText="The woman in the picture is me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <139 StartTime="788571" EndTime="793280" PlainText="She's a goddamned liar! Some nutcase seeking money or publicity!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <140 StartTime="793367" EndTime="797235" PlainText="God only knows why! like that Russian babe, Anaesthesia!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <141 StartTime="797330" EndTime="799406" PlainText="They're inbound!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <142 StartTime="804045" EndTime="807793" PlainText="Rose DeWitt Bukater died on Titanic when she was 17." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <143 StartTime="807882" EndTime="809210" PlainText="Right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <144 StartTime="809300" EndTime="811873" PlainText="If she'd lived, she'd be over 100 by now." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <145 StartTime="811969" EndTime="814377" PlainText="101 next month." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <146 StartTime="814472" EndTime="817508" PlainText="So she's a very old goddamned liar!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <147 StartTime="817600" EndTime="820554" PlainText="I've done the background on this woman..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <148 StartTime="820645" EndTime="824227" PlainText="...back to the '20s when she was working as an actress." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <149 StartTime="824315" EndTime="825809" PlainText="An actress!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <150 StartTime="825900" EndTime="830028" PlainText="There's your first clue, Sherlock! Her name was Rose Dawson back then." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <151 StartTime="830112" EndTime="835569" PlainText="She marries a guy named Calvert. They move to Cedar Rapids and have kids." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <152 StartTime="835660" EndTime="838696" PlainText="Now Calvert’s dead, and Cedar Rapids, too." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <153 StartTime="838788" EndTime="841540" PlainText="Everybody who knows about the diamond..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <154 StartTime="841624" EndTime="843617" PlainText="...is supposed to be dead or on this boat, but she knows." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <155 StartTime="856597" EndTime="859598" PlainText="Doesn't exactly travel light, does she?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <156 StartTime="861602" EndTime="863761" PlainText="Mrs. Calvert, I'm Brock Lovett." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <157 StartTime="863855" EndTime="865931" PlainText="Welcome to the Keldysh." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <158 StartTime="867525" EndTime="869482" PlainText="let's get her inside." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <159 StartTime="869527" EndTime="870902" PlainText="Hi, Ms. Calvert." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <160 StartTime="870987" EndTime="873275" PlainText="- Hi. - Welcome to the Keldysh." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <161 StartTime="875199" EndTime="876741" PlainText="(Man) Hey." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <162 StartTime="876826" EndTime="878486" PlainText="Hey!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <163 StartTime="883082" EndTime="884742" PlainText="(knocking)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <164 StartTime="884792" EndTime="885823" PlainText="Yes?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <165 StartTime="885877" EndTime="888831" PlainText="- Are your staterooms all right? - Very nice." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <166 StartTime="888921" EndTime="892006" PlainText="Have you met my granddaughter Lizzy?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <167 StartTime="892091" EndTime="894131" PlainText="She takes care of me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <168 StartTime="894218" EndTime="896840" PlainText="We met just a few minutes ago." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <169 StartTime="896929" EndTime="899467" PlainText="Remember, Nana? Up on deck?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <170 StartTime="899557" EndTime="902095" PlainText="(Rose) There, that's nice." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <171 StartTime="902185" EndTime="904889" PlainText="Have to have my pictures when I travel." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <172 StartTime="904979" EndTime="907552" PlainText="Is there anything you'd like?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <173 StartTime="909233" EndTime="910727" PlainText="Yes." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <174 StartTime="910818" EndTime="913440" PlainText="I would like to see my drawing." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <175 StartTime="926125" EndTime="931582" PlainText="(Brock) Louis XVI wore a fabulous stone, the Blue Diamond of the Crown,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <176 StartTime="931672" EndTime="934709" PlainText="...which disappeared in 1792." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <177 StartTime="934801" EndTime="938585" PlainText="About that time old Louis lost everything, from the neck up." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <178 StartTime="938679" EndTime="943306" PlainText="The theory goes that the Crown Diamond was chopped, too." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <179 StartTime="943392" EndTime="947639" PlainText="Recut into a heart shape that became known as ''The Heart of the Ocean''." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <180 StartTime="947730" EndTime="950102" PlainText="Today it'd be worth more than the Hope Diamond." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <181 StartTime="950191" EndTime="952599" PlainText="It was a dreadful, heavy thing." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <182 StartTime="952693" EndTime="955564" PlainText="I only wore it this once." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <183 StartTime="955655" EndTime="957943" PlainText="You actually think this is you, Nana?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <184 StartTime="958032" EndTime="959989" PlainText="It is me, dear." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <185 StartTime="960076" EndTime="962152" PlainText="Wasn't I a dish?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <186 StartTime="963579" EndTime="966414" PlainText="I tracked it down through insurance records." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <187 StartTime="966499" EndTime="970283" PlainText="An old claim that was settled under terms of absolute secrecy." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <188 StartTime="970378" EndTime="974791" PlainText="Can you tell me who the claimant was, Rose?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <189 StartTime="974882" EndTime="977089" PlainText="I imagine someone named Hockley." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <190 StartTime="977176" EndTime="979501" PlainText="Nathan Hockley, that's right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <191 StartTime="979595" EndTime="981635" PlainText="Pittsburgh steel tycoon." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <192 StartTime="981722" EndTime="986717" PlainText="The claim was for a necklace his son Caledon bought his fiancée - you -" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <193 StartTime="986811" EndTime="989765" PlainText="...a week before he sailed on Titanic." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <194 StartTime="989856" EndTime="992726" PlainText="It was filed right after the sinking,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <195 StartTime="992817" EndTime="997146" PlainText="...so the diamond had to have gone down with the ship." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <196 StartTime="998656" EndTime="1000732" PlainText="You see the date?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <197 StartTime="1001409" EndTime="1003448" PlainText="''April 14, 1912.''" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <198 StartTime="1003536" EndTime="1006027" PlainText="If your grandmother is who she says she is,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <199 StartTime="1006122" EndTime="1009123" PlainText="...she was wearing the diamond the day the Titanic sank." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <200 StartTime="1009208" EndTime="1012708" PlainText="And that makes you my new best friend." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <201 StartTime="1012795" EndTime="1017422" PlainText="These are some of the things we recovered from your stateroom." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <202 StartTime="1019427" EndTime="1021503" PlainText="This was mine!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <203 StartTime="1022305" EndTime="1024344" PlainText="How extraordinary!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <204 StartTime="1024432" EndTime="1028595" PlainText="And it looks the same as it did the last time I saw it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <205 StartTime="1034192" EndTime="1036683" PlainText="The reflection has changed a bit." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <206 StartTime="1053419" EndTime="1055993" PlainText="Are you ready to go back to Titanic?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <207 StartTime="1059467" EndTime="1063928" PlainText="Okay, here we go. She hits the berg on the starboard side, right?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <208 StartTime="1064013" EndTime="1068924" PlainText="She bumps along, punching holes along the side, below the waterline." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <209 StartTime="1069018" EndTime="1072767" PlainText="Then the forward compartments start to flood." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <210 StartTime="1072855" EndTime="1076105" PlainText="As the water rises, it spills over the watertight bulkheads..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <211 StartTime="1076192" EndTime="1078897" PlainText="...which don't go any higher than ''E'' deck." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <212 StartTime="1078986" EndTime="1082854" PlainText="So now as the bow goes down, the stern rises up,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <213 StartTime="1082949" EndTime="1085404" PlainText="...slow at first, then faster and faster,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <214 StartTime="1085493" EndTime="1089076" PlainText="...until she's got her whole ass up in the air. A big ass." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <215 StartTime="1089163" EndTime="1092828" PlainText="We're talking 20,000, 30,000 tons, okay?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <216 StartTime="1092917" EndTime="1097164" PlainText="The hull's not designed to deal with that pressure, so what happens?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <217 StartTime="1097255" EndTime="1102711" PlainText="She splits, right down to the keel, and the stern falls back level." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <218 StartTime="1102802" EndTime="1105672" PlainText="As the bow sinks it pulls the stern vertical..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <219 StartTime="1105763" EndTime="1108088" PlainText="...and then finally detaches." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <220 StartTime="1108182" EndTime="1112809" PlainText="The stern section bobs there like a cork for a few minutes,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <221 StartTime="1112895" EndTime="1115565" PlainText="...floods, and finally goes under about 2.20am." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <222 StartTime="1115648" EndTime="1119183" PlainText="Two hours and 40 minutes after the collision." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <223 StartTime="1119277" EndTime="1123986" PlainText="The bow section planes away, landing about half a mile away,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <224 StartTime="1124073" EndTime="1127240" PlainText="...going 20, 30 knots when it hits the ocean floor." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <225 StartTime="1129912" EndTime="1131739" PlainText="Pretty cool, huh?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <226 StartTime="1131831" EndTime="1137170" PlainText="Thank you for that fine forensic analysis, Mr. Bodine." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <227 StartTime="1137253" EndTime="1143126" PlainText="Of course, the experience of it was... somewhat different." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <228 StartTime="1143217" EndTime="1145755" PlainText="Will you share it with us?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <229 StartTime="1200399" EndTime="1202890" PlainText="- I'm taking her to rest. - No." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <230 StartTime="1202985" EndTime="1205061" PlainText="- Come on, Nana. - No!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <231 StartTime="1209659" EndTime="1211735" PlainText="Tape recorder." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <232 StartTime="1213120" EndTime="1215197" PlainText="Tell us, Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <233 StartTime="1217375" EndTime="1219414" PlainText="It's been 84 years." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <234 StartTime="1219502" EndTime="1221494" PlainText="Try to remember anything." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <235 StartTime="1221587" EndTime="1223165" PlainText="Anything at all." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <236 StartTime="1223256" EndTime="1227040" PlainText="Do you want to hear this or not, Mr. Lovett?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <237 StartTime="1231222" EndTime="1234342" PlainText="It's been 84 years..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <238 StartTime="1235101" EndTime="1238849" PlainText="...and I can still smell the fresh paint." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <239 StartTime="1240940" EndTime="1243645" PlainText="The china had never been used." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <240 StartTime="1244569" EndTime="1247142" PlainText="The sheets had never been slept in." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <241 StartTime="1248781" EndTime="1252316" PlainText="Titanic was called ''The Ship of Dreams''." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <242 StartTime="1254287" EndTime="1256363" PlainText="And it was." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <243 StartTime="1256497" EndTime="1258573" PlainText="It really was." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <244 StartTime="1287028" EndTime="1289863" PlainText="All third-class passengers..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <245 StartTime="1289947" EndTime="1292070" PlainText="...with a forward berth,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <246 StartTime="1292158" EndTime="1295361" PlainText="...this way, please. This queue. Right here." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <247 StartTime="1295453" EndTime="1296733" PlainText="Big boat, uh?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <248 StartTime="1296829" EndTime="1299154" PlainText="- Daddy, it's a ship. - You're right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <249 StartTime="1299248" EndTime="1301324" PlainText="(car horn)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <250 StartTime="1329904" EndTime="1334447" PlainText="Why all the fuss? It doesn't look any bigger than the Mauretania." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <251 StartTime="1334534" EndTime="1338531" PlainText="You can be blasé about some things, Rose, but not about Titanic." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <252 StartTime="1338621" EndTime="1340281" PlainText="It's 100 feet longer..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <253 StartTime="1340373" EndTime="1342412" PlainText="...and far more luxurious." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <254 StartTime="1342500" EndTime="1345536" PlainText="Your daughter is difficult to impress, Ruth." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <255 StartTime="1345628" EndTime="1348629" PlainText="So this is the ship they say is unsinkable." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <256 StartTime="1348714" EndTime="1351384" PlainText="God himself could not sink this ship." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <257 StartTime="1351467" EndTime="1355216" PlainText="Sir, you have to check your baggage through the main terminal." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <258 StartTime="1355304" EndTime="1358673" PlainText="I put my faith in you, good sir. Now kindly see my man." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <259 StartTime="1358766" EndTime="1360806" PlainText="Yes, sir. My pleasure, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <260 StartTime="1360893" EndTime="1362091" PlainText="Right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <261 StartTime="1362186" EndTime="1364938" PlainText="All the trunks from that car there,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <262 StartTime="1365022" EndTime="1368391" PlainText="...12 from here, and the safe,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <263 StartTime="1368484" EndTime="1371355" PlainText="...to the Parlour Suite, rooms B52, 54, 56." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <264 StartTime="1371445" EndTime="1372904" PlainText="(whistle)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <265 StartTime="1372989" EndTime="1375028" PlainText="Ladies..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <266 StartTime="1375116" EndTime="1376824" PlainText="Better hurry." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <267 StartTime="1381789" EndTime="1384363" PlainText="- My coat? - I have it, miss." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <268 StartTime="1385793" EndTime="1390621" PlainText="All third-class passengers queue here for health inspection." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <269 StartTime="1390715" EndTime="1392090" PlainText="Chin up." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <270 StartTime="1397013" EndTime="1400927" PlainText="Welcome aboard, ma'am. Welcome to Titanic." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <271 StartTime="1401017" EndTime="1404552" PlainText="(Rose) It was the ship of dreams -to everyone else." FormattedText="{(Rose) It was the ship of dreams -to everyone else. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <272 StartTime="1405521" EndTime="1408191" PlainText="To me it was a slave ship..." FormattedText="{To me it was a slave ship... Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <273 StartTime="1408274" EndTime="1412023" PlainText="...taking me back to America in chains." FormattedText="{...taking me back to America in chains. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <274 StartTime="1412111" EndTime="1416654" PlainText="Outwardly I was everything a well-brought-up girl should be." FormattedText="{Outwardly I was everything a well-brought-up girl should be. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <275 StartTime="1416741" EndTime="1419148" PlainText="Inside, I was screaming." FormattedText="{Inside, I was screaming. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <276 StartTime="1419243" EndTime="1421035" PlainText="(steam whistle)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <277 StartTime="1431964" EndTime="1434040" PlainText="(speaking Swedish)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <278 StartTime="1435384" EndTime="1438753" PlainText="Jack, you are pazzo. You bet everything we have." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <279 StartTime="1438846" EndTime="1442096" PlainText="When you got nothing, you got nothing to lose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <280 StartTime="1443601" EndTime="1448393" PlainText="(Swedish) You moron. I can't believe you bet our tickets." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <281 StartTime="1449232" EndTime="1450263" PlainText="Sven?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <282 StartTime="1471921" EndTime="1474542" PlainText="All right... moment of truth." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <283 StartTime="1474924" EndTime="1477545" PlainText="Somebody's life's about to change." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <284 StartTime="1477635" EndTime="1478631" PlainText="Fabrizio?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <285 StartTime="1480721" EndTime="1481753" PlainText="Niente." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <286 StartTime="1481806" EndTime="1482885" PlainText="Niente." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <287 StartTime="1484433" EndTime="1486093" PlainText="Olaf?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <288 StartTime="1486394" EndTime="1487508" PlainText="Nothing." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <289 StartTime="1487603" EndTime="1489263" PlainText="Sven?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <290 StartTime="1491649" EndTime="1494354" PlainText="Uh-oh. Two pair." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <291 StartTime="1494569" EndTime="1496608" PlainText="I'm sorry, Fabrizio." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <292 StartTime="1496696" EndTime="1499068" PlainText="''Sorry''? You bet all the money!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <293 StartTime="1499157" EndTime="1503024" PlainText="I'm sorry. You're not gonna see your mom for a long time." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <294 StartTime="1503119" EndTime="1506535" PlainText="Cos we're going to America! Full house, boys!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <295 StartTime="1506622" EndTime="1508200" PlainText="Whoa!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <296 StartTime="1508291" EndTime="1509619" PlainText="Yeah!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <297 StartTime="1509709" EndTime="1511832" PlainText="Dio mio, grazie!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <298 StartTime="1513504" EndTime="1515912" PlainText="(cursing in Swedish)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <299 StartTime="1519343" EndTime="1521003" PlainText="Come on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <300 StartTime="1521095" EndTime="1522340" PlainText="Figlio di puttana!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <301 StartTime="1522430" EndTime="1524173" PlainText="I'm going home!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <302 StartTime="1524265" EndTime="1526341" PlainText="(cursing in Swedish)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <303 StartTime="1527018" EndTime="1528263" PlainText="I'm going home!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <304 StartTime="1528352" EndTime="1530392" PlainText="I go to America!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <305 StartTime="1530480" EndTime="1531678" PlainText="No, mate." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <306 StartTime="1531772" EndTime="1534608" PlainText="Titanic go to America, in five minutes." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <307 StartTime="1535776" EndTime="1538232" PlainText="Come on! Come on, here!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <308 StartTime="1538321" EndTime="1540479" PlainText="Andiamo!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <309 StartTime="1540573" EndTime="1544405" PlainText="We're riding in high style now! We're a couple of swells!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <310 StartTime="1544494" EndTime="1547411" PlainText="Practically goddamn royalty, ragazzo mio!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <311 StartTime="1547497" EndTime="1550533" PlainText="You see, it's my destino!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <312 StartTime="1550625" EndTime="1553116" PlainText="I go to America to be millionario!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <313 StartTime="1553211" EndTime="1554835" PlainText="(Driver) Whoa! Whoa!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <314 StartTime="1554921" EndTime="1556581" PlainText="Bastardo!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <315 StartTime="1556672" EndTime="1560966" PlainText="- You're pazzo! - Maybe, but I've got the tickets!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <316 StartTime="1561052" EndTime="1563341" PlainText="Come on, I thought you were fast!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <317 StartTime="1563429" EndTime="1567641" PlainText="- Aspetta! - Wait! Hey, wait!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <318 StartTime="1567725" EndTime="1570216" PlainText="We're passengers! Passengers!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <319 StartTime="1571103" EndTime="1574519" PlainText="- Have you been through the inspection? - Of course!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <320 StartTime="1574607" EndTime="1577561" PlainText="Anyway, we don't have lice. We're Americans." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <321 StartTime="1577652" EndTime="1580569" PlainText="Right. Come aboard." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <322 StartTime="1583533" EndTime="1586866" PlainText="We're the luckiest sons of bitches in the world!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <323 StartTime="1587078" EndTime="1589783" PlainText="(ship's horn)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <324 StartTime="1595253" EndTime="1596961" PlainText="Goodbye!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <325 StartTime="1601175" EndTime="1603845" PlainText="- You know somebody? - That's not the point." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <326 StartTime="1603928" EndTime="1608590" PlainText="- Goodbye! I'll miss you! - Goodbye! I will never forget you!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <327 StartTime="1608808" EndTime="1610931" PlainText="(crowd cheering)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <328 StartTime="1657148" EndTime="1659224" PlainText="Go left, darling." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <329 StartTime="1664113" EndTime="1665940" PlainText="G60, G60..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <330 StartTime="1666032" EndTime="1668108" PlainText="Excuse me, ma'am." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <331 StartTime="1670369" EndTime="1672445" PlainText="Oh, right here." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <332 StartTime="1672747" EndTime="1676116" PlainText="Hey, how you doing? Jack. Nice to meet you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <333 StartTime="1676209" EndTime="1680123" PlainText="I'm Jack Dawson. Nice to meet you. How you doing?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <334 StartTime="1680213" EndTime="1682786" PlainText="Who says you get top bunk, huh?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <335 StartTime="1684467" EndTime="1686506" PlainText="(Swedish) Where's Sven?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <336 StartTime="1686594" EndTime="1692015" PlainText="This is your private deck, sir. Would you be requiring anything?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <337 StartTime="1692099" EndTime="1694092" PlainText="- Mm-mm. - Excuse me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <338 StartTime="1694185" EndTime="1698894" PlainText="- This one? - No... It had a lot of faces on it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <339 StartTime="1698981" EndTime="1701057" PlainText="This is the one." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <340 StartTime="1701609" EndTime="1704278" PlainText="Would you like all of them out, miss?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <341 StartTime="1704362" EndTime="1707565" PlainText="Yes... We need a little colour in this room." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <342 StartTime="1709992" EndTime="1712530" PlainText="Put it in there, in the wardrobe." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <343 StartTime="1712620" EndTime="1715621" PlainText="God, not those finger paintings again!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <344 StartTime="1715706" EndTime="1717165" PlainText="Waste of money!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <345 StartTime="1717250" EndTime="1719373" PlainText="The difference between Cal's taste and mine..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <346 StartTime="1719460" EndTime="1722295" PlainText="...is that I have some. They're fascinating." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <347 StartTime="1722380" EndTime="1725630" PlainText="like being inside a dream or something." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <348 StartTime="1725716" EndTime="1727590" PlainText="There's truth, but no logic." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <349 StartTime="1727677" EndTime="1730761" PlainText="- What's the artist's name? - Something Picasso." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <350 StartTime="1730847" EndTime="1734927" PlainText="''Something Picasso''. He won't amount to a thing. Trust me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <351 StartTime="1735017" EndTime="1738718" PlainText="- Put the Degas in the bedroom. - At least they were cheap." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <352 StartTime="1738813" EndTime="1740889" PlainText="Put it in the wardrobe." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <353 StartTime="1745611" EndTime="1749739" PlainText="(Rose) At Cherbourg, a woman came aboard named Margaret Brown." FormattedText="{(Rose) At Cherbourg, a woman came aboard named Margaret Brown. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <354 StartTime="1749824" EndTime="1751816" PlainText="We all called her Molly." FormattedText="{We all called her Molly. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <355 StartTime="1751909" EndTime="1755954" PlainText="History would call her ''The Unsinkable Molly Brown''." FormattedText="{History would call her ''The Unsinkable Molly Brown''. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <356 StartTime="1756038" EndTime="1760617" PlainText="I wasn't about to wait all day, sonny. Here, think you can manage?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <357 StartTime="1760710" EndTime="1764293" PlainText="Her husband had struck gold someplace out west..." FormattedText="{Her husband had struck gold someplace out west... Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <358 StartTime="1764380" EndTime="1767714" PlainText="...and she was what Mother called ''new money''." FormattedText="{...and she was what Mother called ''new money''. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <359 StartTime="1767800" EndTime="1772177" PlainText="By next afternoon we were steaming west from the coast of Ireland..." FormattedText="{By next afternoon we were steaming west from the coast of Ireland... Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <360 StartTime="1772263" EndTime="1776427" PlainText="...with nothing out ahead of us but ocean." FormattedText="{...with nothing out ahead of us but ocean. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <361 StartTime="1782690" EndTime="1785857" PlainText="Take her to sea, Mr. Murdoch." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <362 StartTime="1785943" EndTime="1788980" PlainText="- let’s stretch her legs. - Yes, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <363 StartTime="1790907" EndTime="1794110" PlainText="- All ahead full, Mr. Moody. - Very good, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <364 StartTime="1794619" EndTime="1796445" PlainText="(bells ringing)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <365 StartTime="1798790" EndTime="1800070" PlainText="All ahead full." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <366 StartTime="1800166" EndTime="1802408" PlainText="(Man) All ahead full!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <367 StartTime="1802502" EndTime="1804578" PlainText="Come on, lads. Step lively." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <368 StartTime="1822855" EndTime="1826355" PlainText="let’s stoke them right up! We're going full ahead!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <369 StartTime="1882957" EndTime="1885033" PlainText="21 knots, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <370 StartTime="1893342" EndTime="1896012" PlainText="Hey, look, look, look! look, look!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <371 StartTime="1898347" EndTime="1899842" PlainText="See it?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <372 StartTime="1903144" EndTime="1905302" PlainText="There's another one! See him?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <373 StartTime="1915072" EndTime="1916864" PlainText="look at that one!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <374 StartTime="1916949" EndTime="1918942" PlainText="look at him jump!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <375 StartTime="1919035" EndTime="1919781" PlainText="Whoo-hoo!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <376 StartTime="1941599" EndTime="1943390" PlainText="Whoo!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <377 StartTime="1944060" EndTime="1946729" PlainText="I can see the Statue of liberty already!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <378 StartTime="1946813" EndTime="1948639" PlainText="Very small, of course." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <379 StartTime="1951108" EndTime="1955106" PlainText="I'm the king of the world!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <380 StartTime="1955196" EndTime="1956939" PlainText="(whooping and yelling)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <381 StartTime="2000783" EndTime="2003618" PlainText="She is the largest moving object ever made by the hand of man..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <382 StartTime="2003703" EndTime="2005576" PlainText="...in all history." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <383 StartTime="2005663" EndTime="2008747" PlainText="Our master shipbuilder, Mr. Andrews,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <384 StartTime="2008833" EndTime="2010375" PlainText="...designed her." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <385 StartTime="2010460" EndTime="2012333" PlainText="I knocked her together..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <386 StartTime="2012420" EndTime="2014911" PlainText="...but the idea was Mr. Ismay's." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <387 StartTime="2015006" EndTime="2018422" PlainText="He envisioned a steamer so grand in scale..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <388 StartTime="2018509" EndTime="2021843" PlainText="...that its supremacy would never be challenged." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <389 StartTime="2021929" EndTime="2023507" PlainText="And here she is..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <390 StartTime="2023598" EndTime="2025756" PlainText="...willed into solid reality." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <391 StartTime="2025850" EndTime="2027843" PlainText="Hear, hear." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <392 StartTime="2027935" EndTime="2029928" PlainText="Salmon." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <393 StartTime="2032899" EndTime="2036564" PlainText="You know I don't like that, Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <394 StartTime="2038738" EndTime="2040730" PlainText="She knows." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <395 StartTime="2042116" EndTime="2046743" PlainText="We’ll both have the Iamb, rare, with very little mint sauce." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <396 StartTime="2046829" EndTime="2049403" PlainText="You like Iamb, right, sweet pea?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <397 StartTime="2051250" EndTime="2054287" PlainText="Are you gonna cut her meat for her, too, Cal?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <398 StartTime="2057256" EndTime="2061420" PlainText="Hey, who thought of the name ''Titanic''? Was it you, Bruce?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <399 StartTime="2061511" EndTime="2063053" PlainText="Yes, actually." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <400 StartTime="2063137" EndTime="2068048" PlainText="I wanted to convey sheer size, and the size means stability,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <401 StartTime="2068142" EndTime="2072270" PlainText="...luxury, and, above all, strength." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <402 StartTime="2072355" EndTime="2074893" PlainText="Do you know of Dr. Freud, Mr. Ismay?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <403 StartTime="2074982" EndTime="2079443" PlainText="His ideas about male preoccupation with size might interest you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <404 StartTime="2080822" EndTime="2084356" PlainText="- What's gotten into you? - Excuse me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <405 StartTime="2087662" EndTime="2089654" PlainText="I do apologise." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <406 StartTime="2089831" EndTime="2092037" PlainText="She's a pistol, Cal. Hope you can handle her." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <407 StartTime="2092125" EndTime="2096621" PlainText="Well, I may have to start minding what she reads, Mrs. Brown." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <408 StartTime="2096712" EndTime="2100212" PlainText="Freud... who is he? Is he a passenger?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <409 StartTime="2101342" EndTime="2104509" PlainText="...turns the propeller,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <410 StartTime="2104595" EndTime="2106671" PlainText="...makes these waves,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <411 StartTime="2107265" EndTime="2109341" PlainText="...makes them spin." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <412 StartTime="2112478" EndTime="2115016" PlainText="(Fabrizio) The ship is nice, uh?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <413 StartTime="2115106" EndTime="2118142" PlainText="- Yeah, it's an Irish ship. - Is English, no?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <414 StartTime="2118234" EndTime="2122777" PlainText="No, it was built in Ireland. 15,000 Irishmen built this ship." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <415 StartTime="2122864" EndTime="2124524" PlainText="That's typical." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <416 StartTime="2124615" EndTime="2128483" PlainText="First-class dogs come down here to take a shite." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <417 StartTime="2128578" EndTime="2130617" PlainText="It lets us know where we rank." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <418 StartTime="2130705" EndTime="2132781" PlainText="like we could forget?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <419 StartTime="2133332" EndTime="2135372" PlainText="I'm Tommy Ryan." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <420 StartTime="2135460" EndTime="2137832" PlainText="- Jack Dawson. - Fabrizio." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <421 StartTime="2137920" EndTime="2142167" PlainText="Hi. Do you make any money with your drawings?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <422 StartTime="2151142" EndTime="2156433" PlainText="Oh, forget it, boyo. You'd as like have angels fly out of your arse..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <423 StartTime="2156522" EndTime="2159013" PlainText="...as get next to the likes of her." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <424 StartTime="2181422" EndTime="2185751" PlainText="(Rose) I saw my whole life as if I'd already lived it,..." FormattedText="{(Rose) I saw my whole life as if I'd already lived it,... Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <425 StartTime="2185843" EndTime="2189675" PlainText="...an endless parade of parties and cotillions,..." FormattedText="{...an endless parade of parties and cotillions,... Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <426 StartTime="2189764" EndTime="2191840" PlainText="...yachts and polo matches." FormattedText="{...yachts and polo matches. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <427 StartTime="2192642" EndTime="2197553" PlainText="Always the same narrow people, the same mindless chatter." FormattedText="{Always the same narrow people, the same mindless chatter. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <428 StartTime="2197647" EndTime="2201775" PlainText="I felt like I was standing at a great precipice..." FormattedText="{I felt like I was standing at a great precipice... Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <429 StartTime="2201859" EndTime="2204529" PlainText="...with no-one to pull me back." FormattedText="{...with no-one to pull me back. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <430 StartTime="2204612" EndTime="2208941" PlainText="No-one who cared, or even noticed." FormattedText="{No-one who cared, or even noticed. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <431 StartTime="2216916" EndTime="2218992" PlainText="(Rose sobbing)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <432 StartTime="2239272" EndTime="2241348" PlainText="(Rose running and sobbing)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <433 StartTime="2318518" EndTime="2319893" PlainText="Don't do it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <434 StartTime="2319977" EndTime="2321970" PlainText="Stay back." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <435 StartTime="2322063" EndTime="2324269" PlainText="Don't come any closer." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <436 StartTime="2325066" EndTime="2327105" PlainText="Come on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <437 StartTime="2327193" EndTime="2330229" PlainText="- Gimme your hand. I'll pull you back. - No!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <438 StartTime="2330321" EndTime="2332693" PlainText="Stay where you are. I mean it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <439 StartTime="2333699" EndTime="2335775" PlainText="I'll let go." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <440 StartTime="2345336" EndTime="2347412" PlainText="No, you won't." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <441 StartTime="2348464" EndTime="2351335" PlainText="What do you mean, no, I won't?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <442 StartTime="2351425" EndTime="2355174" PlainText="Don't presume to tell me what I will and will not do." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <443 StartTime="2355263" EndTime="2357302" PlainText="Well, you would've done it already." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <444 StartTime="2357390" EndTime="2359963" PlainText="You're distracting me. Go away." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <445 StartTime="2360059" EndTime="2361601" PlainText="I can't." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <446 StartTime="2361686" EndTime="2364011" PlainText="I'm involved now." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <447 StartTime="2364105" EndTime="2368055" PlainText="You let go and I'm gonna have to jump in there after you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <448 StartTime="2369318" EndTime="2372189" PlainText="Don't be absurd. You'll be killed." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <449 StartTime="2372280" EndTime="2376064" PlainText="- I'm a good swimmer. - The fall alone would kill you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <450 StartTime="2376159" EndTime="2379610" PlainText="It would hurt. I'm not saying it wouldn't." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <451 StartTime="2379704" EndTime="2383832" PlainText="But I'm more concerned about that water being so cold." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <452 StartTime="2390173" EndTime="2392046" PlainText="How cold?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <453 StartTime="2392133" EndTime="2395584" PlainText="Freezing. Maybe a couple of degrees over." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <454 StartTime="2399015" EndTime="2401303" PlainText="You ever, uh..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <455 StartTime="2401392" EndTime="2403717" PlainText="...ever been to Wisconsin?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <456 StartTime="2406230" EndTime="2407606" PlainText="What?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <457 StartTime="2407690" EndTime="2410181" PlainText="They have some of the coldest winters." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <458 StartTime="2410276" EndTime="2413443" PlainText="I grew up there, near Chippewa Falls." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <459 StartTime="2413529" EndTime="2417444" PlainText="When I was a kid, me and my father went ice fishing..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <460 StartTime="2417533" EndTime="2419490" PlainText="...out on lake Wissota." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <461 StartTime="2419577" EndTime="2421534" PlainText="Ice fishing is where you..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <462 StartTime="2421621" EndTime="2423946" PlainText="I know what ice fishing is!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <463 StartTime="2424040" EndTime="2425914" PlainText="Sorry." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <464 StartTime="2427043" EndTime="2430875" PlainText="You just seem like, you know, kind of an indoor girl." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <465 StartTime="2432757" EndTime="2434999" PlainText="Anyway, I, uh..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <466 StartTime="2435092" EndTime="2437465" PlainText="I fell through some thin ice." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <467 StartTime="2437553" EndTime="2440258" PlainText="And I'm telling you..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <468 StartTime="2440348" EndTime="2443681" PlainText="...water that cold, like right down there,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <469 StartTime="2443768" EndTime="2447812" PlainText="...it hits you like a thousand knives stabbing you all over." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <470 StartTime="2447897" EndTime="2450602" PlainText="You can't breathe..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <471 StartTime="2451692" EndTime="2453685" PlainText="You can't think..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <472 StartTime="2453778" EndTime="2456447" PlainText="At least not about anything but the pain." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <473 StartTime="2457990" EndTime="2462866" PlainText="Which is why I'm not looking forward to jumping in there after you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <474 StartTime="2462954" EndTime="2464614" PlainText="like I said,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <475 StartTime="2466457" EndTime="2468533" PlainText="...I don't have a choice." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <476 StartTime="2472255" EndTime="2477213" PlainText="I'm hoping you'll come back over the rail and get me off the hook here." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <477 StartTime="2477301" EndTime="2479377" PlainText="You're crazy." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <478 StartTime="2479929" EndTime="2482598" PlainText="That's what everybody says, but..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <479 StartTime="2483182" EndTime="2488473" PlainText="With all due respect, miss, I'm not the one hanging off the back of a ship." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <480 StartTime="2488563" EndTime="2490602" PlainText="Come on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <481 StartTime="2490690" EndTime="2493525" PlainText="Come on, gimme your hand." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <482 StartTime="2493609" EndTime="2496563" PlainText="You don't wanna do this." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <483 StartTime="2508624" EndTime="2510284" PlainText="Whew!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <484 StartTime="2510710" EndTime="2512749" PlainText="I'm Jack Dawson." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <485 StartTime="2512837" EndTime="2514794" PlainText="Rose DeWitt Bukater." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <486 StartTime="2514881" EndTime="2517550" PlainText="I'll have to get you to write that down!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <487 StartTime="2519802" EndTime="2521427" PlainText="Come on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <488 StartTime="2523723" EndTime="2525217" PlainText="(screams)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <489 StartTime="2526350" EndTime="2529351" PlainText="I got you! Come on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <490 StartTime="2529437" EndTime="2531476" PlainText="Come on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <491 StartTime="2533524" EndTime="2534983" PlainText="(screams)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <492 StartTime="2535067" EndTime="2536478" PlainText="Help! Please!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <493 StartTime="2536569" EndTime="2538645" PlainText="Help! Please!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <494 StartTime="2539947" EndTime="2542617" PlainText="- Please help me! - Listen! Listen to me!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <495 StartTime="2542700" EndTime="2544443" PlainText="I've got you. I won't let go." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <496 StartTime="2544535" EndTime="2546824" PlainText="Now pull yourself up. Come on!"
