FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <497 StartTime="2549499" EndTime="2550447" PlainText="Come on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <498 StartTime="2550500" EndTime="2552042" PlainText="That's right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <499 StartTime="2552126" EndTime="2554617" PlainText="You can do it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <500 StartTime="2558633" EndTime="2560091" PlainText="I got you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <501 StartTime="2565056" EndTime="2568140" PlainText="What's all this?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <502 StartTime="2572980" EndTime="2576480" PlainText="You stand back! And don't move an inch!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <503 StartTime="2577443" EndTime="2579483" PlainText="Fetch the master-at-arms!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <504 StartTime="2579570" EndTime="2581610" PlainText="Care for a brandy?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <505 StartTime="2581697" EndTime="2584449" PlainText="(Cal) This is completely unacceptable!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <506 StartTime="2584534" EndTime="2587903" PlainText="How dare you put your hands on my fiancée!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <507 StartTime="2587995" EndTime="2590321" PlainText="- look at me, you filth! - Cal..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <508 StartTime="2590414" EndTime="2594958" PlainText="- What do you think you were doing? - Cal, stop! It was an accident." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <509 StartTime="2595044" EndTime="2597001" PlainText="An accident?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <510 StartTime="2597088" EndTime="2598582" PlainText="It was." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <511 StartTime="2598673" EndTime="2600831" PlainText="Stupid, really." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <512 StartTime="2600925" EndTime="2604128" PlainText="I was leaning over and I slipped." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <513 StartTime="2605680" EndTime="2610306" PlainText="I was leaning far over to see the, uh..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <514 StartTime="2610393" EndTime="2611804" PlainText="...uh..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <515 StartTime="2611894" EndTime="2612926" PlainText="...the, uh..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <516 StartTime="2613020" EndTime="2616105" PlainText="- Propellers? - Propellers. And I slipped." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <517 StartTime="2616190" EndTime="2620520" PlainText="I would have gone overboard, but Mr. Dawson here saved me..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <518 StartTime="2620611" EndTime="2623316" PlainText="...and almost went over himself." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <519 StartTime="2623406" EndTime="2627984" PlainText="- She wanted to see the propellers! - Women and machinery do not mix." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <520 StartTime="2628077" EndTime="2631411" PlainText="Was that the way of it?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <521 StartTime="2632748" EndTime="2635370" PlainText="Yeah. Yeah, that was pretty much it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <522 StartTime="2635460" EndTime="2639208" PlainText="The boy's a hero, then. Good for you, son. Well done." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <523 StartTime="2639297" EndTime="2641455" PlainText="So it's all's well, and, uh..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <524 StartTime="2641549" EndTime="2643588" PlainText="...back to our brandy, eh?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <525 StartTime="2643676" EndTime="2647840" PlainText="look at you. You must be freezing. let’s get you inside." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <526 StartTime="2647930" EndTime="2650468" PlainText="Perhaps a little something for the boy?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <527 StartTime="2652518" EndTime="2653977" PlainText="Of course." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <528 StartTime="2654061" EndTime="2657181" PlainText="Mr. Lovejoy, I think a 20 should do it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <529 StartTime="2657315" EndTime="2661063" PlainText="Is that the going rate for saving the woman you love?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <530 StartTime="2662737" EndTime="2665524" PlainText="Rose is displeased. What to do..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <531 StartTime="2666824" EndTime="2668105" PlainText="I know." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <532 StartTime="2670036" EndTime="2674283" PlainText="Perhaps you could join us for dinner tomorrow evening..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <533 StartTime="2674373" EndTime="2677956" PlainText="...to regale our group with... your heroic tale." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <534 StartTime="2680963" EndTime="2682921" PlainText="Sure. Count me in." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <535 StartTime="2683007" EndTime="2686043" PlainText="Good. Settled, then." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <536 StartTime="2686135" EndTime="2689385" PlainText="- This should be interesting. - Mmm." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <537 StartTime="2693392" EndTime="2694507" PlainText="(whistles)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <538 StartTime="2697313" EndTime="2699804" PlainText="Can I, uh... bum a smoke?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <539 StartTime="2707573" EndTime="2709945" PlainText="You’ll want to tie those." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <540 StartTime="2712495" EndTime="2714119" PlainText="It's interesting." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <541 StartTime="2714205" EndTime="2716660" PlainText="The young lady slips so suddenly..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <542 StartTime="2716749" EndTime="2721625" PlainText="...and you still had time to remove your jacket and your shoes." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <543 StartTime="2726467" EndTime="2728009" PlainText="(music box)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <544 StartTime="2728052" EndTime="2729677" PlainText="(knock at door)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <545 StartTime="2735935" EndTime="2738224" PlainText="I know you've been melancholy." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <546 StartTime="2739105" EndTime="2741181" PlainText="I don't pretend to know why." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <547 StartTime="2743734" EndTime="2745941" PlainText="I intended to save this..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <548 StartTime="2746028" EndTime="2749113" PlainText="...until the engagement gala..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <549 StartTime="2749699" EndTime="2751775" PlainText="...next week." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <550 StartTime="2752243" EndTime="2754699" PlainText="But... I thought..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <551 StartTime="2754787" EndTime="2756447" PlainText="...tonight." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <552 StartTime="2757540" EndTime="2759616" PlainText="Good gracious!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <553 StartTime="2759709" EndTime="2761832" PlainText="A reminder of my feelings for you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <554 StartTime="2761919" EndTime="2763248" PlainText="Is it a...?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <555 StartTime="2763337" EndTime="2765164" PlainText="Diamond? Yes." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <556 StartTime="2767633" EndTime="2769709" PlainText="56 carats to be exact." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <557 StartTime="2772722" EndTime="2778475" PlainText="It was worn by Louis XVI, and they called it ''le Coeur de la Mer''." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <558 StartTime="2778561" EndTime="2781266" PlainText="(Both) The Heart of the Ocean." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <559 StartTime="2786861" EndTime="2788900" PlainText="It's overwhelming." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <560 StartTime="2788988" EndTime="2791064" PlainText="Well, it's for royalty." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <561 StartTime="2792033" EndTime="2794109" PlainText="We are royalty, Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <562 StartTime="2797663" EndTime="2801282" PlainText="You know, there's nothing I couldn’t give you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <563 StartTime="2801375" EndTime="2804163" PlainText="There's nothing I'd deny you..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <564 StartTime="2804670" EndTime="2807161" PlainText="...if you would not deny me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <565 StartTime="2809634" EndTime="2812385" PlainText="Oh, open your heart to me, Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <566 StartTime="2828402" EndTime="2833195" PlainText="(Jack) Well, I've been on my own since I was 15, since my folks died." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <567 StartTime="2833282" EndTime="2837410" PlainText="I had no close kin in that part of the country." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <568 StartTime="2837495" EndTime="2840698" PlainText="So I left and I haven't been back since." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <569 StartTime="2840790" EndTime="2844953" PlainText="You could just call me a tumbleweed blowing in the wind." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <570 StartTime="2845419" EndTime="2849880" PlainText="Well, Rose, we've walked about a mile around this boat deck..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <571 StartTime="2849966" EndTime="2854462" PlainText="...and chewed over how great the weather's been and how I grew up,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <572 StartTime="2854554" EndTime="2859132" PlainText="...but I reckon that's not why you came to talk to me, is it?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <573 StartTime="2859225" EndTime="2862060" PlainText="- Mr. Dawson, I... - Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <574 StartTime="2862145" EndTime="2863687" PlainText="Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <575 StartTime="2863771" EndTime="2866345" PlainText="I want to thank you for what you did." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <576 StartTime="2867191" EndTime="2871687" PlainText="Not just for... for pulling me back, but for your discretion." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <577 StartTime="2871779" EndTime="2873571" PlainText="You're welcome." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <578 StartTime="2873656" EndTime="2877523" PlainText="look, I know what you must be thinking." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <579 StartTime="2878953" EndTime="2880993" PlainText="Poor little rich girl." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <580 StartTime="2881080" EndTime="2883488" PlainText="What does she know about misery?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <581 StartTime="2883583" EndTime="2886537" PlainText="No... No, that's not what I was thinking." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <582 StartTime="2886627" EndTime="2890376" PlainText="I was thinking what could have happened to this girl..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <583 StartTime="2890465" EndTime="2893216" PlainText="...to make her think she had no way out." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <584 StartTime="2895094" EndTime="2896968" PlainText="Well, I..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <585 StartTime="2897388" EndTime="2900887" PlainText="It was everything. It was my whole world..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <586 StartTime="2900975" EndTime="2902968" PlainText="...and all the people in it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <587 StartTime="2903060" EndTime="2907853" PlainText="The inertia of my life... plunging ahead, and me powerless to stop it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <588 StartTime="2907940" EndTime="2910396" PlainText="God! look at that thing!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <589 StartTime="2910485" EndTime="2913439" PlainText="You would’ve gone straight to the bottom." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <590 StartTime="2913529" EndTime="2916234" PlainText="500 invitations have gone out." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <591 StartTime="2916532" EndTime="2920281" PlainText="All of Philadelphia society will be there,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <592 StartTime="2920369" EndTime="2924035" PlainText="...and all the while I feel I'm standing in a crowded room..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <593 StartTime="2924123" EndTime="2927741" PlainText="...screaming at the top of my lungs, and no-one even looks up." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <594 StartTime="2928419" EndTime="2930412" PlainText="Do you love him?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <595 StartTime="2931547" EndTime="2933339" PlainText="Pardon me?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <596 StartTime="2933424" EndTime="2935500" PlainText="Do you love him?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <597 StartTime="2935593" EndTime="2938214" PlainText="You shouldn’t be asking me this." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <598 StartTime="2938304" EndTime="2941139" PlainText="It's a simple question. Do you love the guy or not?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <599 StartTime="2942934" EndTime="2947228" PlainText="- This is not a suitable conversation. - Can't you just answer the question?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <600 StartTime="2949690" EndTime="2953605" PlainText="This is absurd. You don't know me and I don't know you,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <601 StartTime="2953694" EndTime="2956898" PlainText="...and we are not having this conversation." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <602 StartTime="2956989" EndTime="2960489" PlainText="You are rude and uncouth and... I am leaving now." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <603 StartTime="2960576" EndTime="2963494" PlainText="Jack... Mr. Dawson, it's been a pleasure." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <604 StartTime="2963579" EndTime="2966070" PlainText="I sought you out to thank you..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <605 StartTime="2966165" EndTime="2969748" PlainText="- And you insulted me. - You deserved it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <606 StartTime="2969836" EndTime="2971912" PlainText="- Right. - Right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <607 StartTime="2974340" EndTime="2977341" PlainText="- I thought you were leaving. - I am." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <608 StartTime="2978511" EndTime="2980587" PlainText="You are so annoying!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <609 StartTime="2980680" EndTime="2982257" PlainText="Wait." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <610 StartTime="2982348" EndTime="2986097" PlainText="I don't have to leave. This is my part of the ship." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <611 StartTime="2986185" EndTime="2988012" PlainText="You leave." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <612 StartTime="2988104" EndTime="2991687" PlainText="Well, well, well! Now who's being rude?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <613 StartTime="2994861" EndTime="2999024" PlainText="What is this stupid thing you're carrying around?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <614 StartTime="2999157" EndTime="3002490" PlainText="So what are you? An artist or something?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <615 StartTime="3003119" EndTime="3006784" PlainText="Well... these are rather good." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <616 StartTime="3010168" EndTime="3013619" PlainText="They're, uh... they're very good, actually." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <617 StartTime="3021179" EndTime="3023800" PlainText="Jack, this is exquisite work." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <618 StartTime="3023890" EndTime="3027555" PlainText="- They didn't like them in old Paris. - Paris?!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <619 StartTime="3027643" EndTime="3031427" PlainText="You do get around, for a poor..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <620 StartTime="3032565" EndTime="3036693" PlainText="Well, uh, uh, a person of limited means." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <621 StartTime="3036777" EndTime="3039103" PlainText="A poor guy. You can say it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <622 StartTime="3042283" EndTime="3043943" PlainText="Well, well, well!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <623 StartTime="3047330" EndTime="3049702" PlainText="And these were drawn from life?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <624 StartTime="3053127" EndTime="3055535" PlainText="That's the good thing about Paris." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <625 StartTime="3055630" EndTime="3059378" PlainText="lots of girls willing to take their clothes off." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <626 StartTime="3063137" EndTime="3065213" PlainText="You liked this woman." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <627 StartTime="3065306" EndTime="3067927" PlainText="You used her several times." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <628 StartTime="3069018" EndTime="3073680" PlainText="Well, she had beautiful hands, you see?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <629 StartTime="3073773" EndTime="3077106" PlainText="I think you must have had a love affair with her." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <630 StartTime="3077193" EndTime="3078224" PlainText="No, no, no." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <631 StartTime="3078319" EndTime="3080644" PlainText="Just with her hands." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <632 StartTime="3080738" EndTime="3083276" PlainText="She was a one-legged prostitute." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <633 StartTime="3083366" EndTime="3084908" PlainText="See?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <634 StartTime="3088246" EndTime="3090119" PlainText="Oh!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <635 StartTime="3090998" EndTime="3093952" PlainText="She had a good sense of humour, though." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <636 StartTime="3095878" EndTime="3097538" PlainText="And this lady..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <637 StartTime="3097630" EndTime="3102458" PlainText="She used to sit at this bar every night..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <638 StartTime="3102552" EndTime="3106715" PlainText="...wearing all her jewellery, waiting for her long-lost love." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <639 StartTime="3107974" EndTime="3110180" PlainText="Called her Madame Bijoux." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <640 StartTime="3110268" EndTime="3114052" PlainText="See how her clothes are all moth-eaten?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <641 StartTime="3114147" EndTime="3117147" PlainText="Well, you have a gift, Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <642 StartTime="3117233" EndTime="3118727" PlainText="You do." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <643 StartTime="3118818" EndTime="3120229" PlainText="You see people." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <644 StartTime="3120319" EndTime="3122526" PlainText="I see you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <645 StartTime="3124490" EndTime="3125984" PlainText="And?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <646 StartTime="3126075" EndTime="3128862" PlainText="You wouldn’t have jumped." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <647 StartTime="3132999" EndTime="3137495" PlainText="But the purpose of university is to find a suitable husband." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <648 StartTime="3137587" EndTime="3139579" PlainText="Rose has already done that." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <649 StartTime="3139672" EndTime="3142459" PlainText="Here comes that vulgar Brown woman." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <650 StartTime="3142550" EndTime="3145302" PlainText="Quickly, get up before she sits with us." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <651 StartTime="3145386" EndTime="3146797" PlainText="Hello, girls." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <652 StartTime="3146888" EndTime="3151051" PlainText="- I was hoping I'd catch you at tea. - We're awfully sorry you missed it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <653 StartTime="3151142" EndTime="3153977" PlainText="The Countess and I were just off to the boat deck." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <654 StartTime="3154061" EndTime="3157146" PlainText="What a lovely idea. I need to catch up on my gossip." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <655 StartTime="3160318" EndTime="3162191" PlainText="Countess." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <656 StartTime="3163446" EndTime="3166696" PlainText="So you've not yet lit the last four boilers?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <657 StartTime="3166782" EndTime="3170033" PlainText="I don't see the need. We are making excellent time." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <658 StartTime="3170119" EndTime="3172789" PlainText="The press knows the size of Titanic." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <659 StartTime="3173039" EndTime="3176242" PlainText="Now I want them to marvel at her speed." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <660 StartTime="3176334" EndTime="3179453" PlainText="We must give them something new to print." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <661 StartTime="3180129" EndTime="3182667" PlainText="This maiden voyage of Titanic..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <662 StartTime="3182757" EndTime="3184749" PlainText="...must make headlines." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <663 StartTime="3184842" EndTime="3188674" PlainText="Mr. Ismay, I would prefer not to push the engines..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <664 StartTime="3188763" EndTime="3191550" PlainText="...until they've been properly run in." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <665 StartTime="3191641" EndTime="3197097" PlainText="Of course, I'm just a passenger. I leave it to you to decide what's best." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <666 StartTime="3197188" EndTime="3201435" PlainText="But a glorious end to your final trip if we arrive on Tuesday night..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <667 StartTime="3201526" EndTime="3204361" PlainText="...and surprise them all. Make the morning papers." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <668 StartTime="3204445" EndTime="3207019" PlainText="Retire with a bang, eh, EJ?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <669 StartTime="3209909" EndTime="3211985" PlainText="Good man." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <670 StartTime="3212870" EndTime="3216702" PlainText="Well, after that I worked on a squid boat in Monterey." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <671 StartTime="3216791" EndTime="3219329" PlainText="Then I went to the pier in Santa Monica..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <672 StartTime="3219418" EndTime="3223499" PlainText="...and started doing portraits there for 10 cents apiece." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <673 StartTime="3223548" EndTime="3227592" PlainText="Why can't I be like you, Jack? Just head out for the horizon..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <674 StartTime="3227677" EndTime="3229753" PlainText="...whenever I feel like it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <675 StartTime="3230513" EndTime="3233680" PlainText="Say we'll go there sometime to that pier..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <676 StartTime="3233766" EndTime="3235889" PlainText="...even if we only just talk about it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <677 StartTime="3235977" EndTime="3237601" PlainText="No, we'll do it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <678 StartTime="3237687" EndTime="3241020" PlainText="We’ll drink cheap beer. Ride on the roller coaster." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <679 StartTime="3241107" EndTime="3244143" PlainText="Then we'll ride horses on the beach..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <680 StartTime="3244235" EndTime="3248813" PlainText="...right in the surf. But like a real cowboy. Not that sidesaddle stuff." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <681 StartTime="3250449" EndTime="3252526" PlainText="You mean, one leg on each side?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <682 StartTime="3252618" EndTime="3254077" PlainText="Yeah." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <683 StartTime="3254162" EndTime="3257577" PlainText="- Can you show me? - Sure. If you like." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <684 StartTime="3258624" EndTime="3262408" PlainText="- Teach me to ride like a man. - And chew tobacco like a man." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <685 StartTime="3263880" EndTime="3266205" PlainText="And spit like a man!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <686 StartTime="3266299" EndTime="3268090" PlainText="They didn't teach you that?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <687 StartTime="3268176" EndTime="3269634" PlainText="No!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <688 StartTime="3269719" EndTime="3271758" PlainText="Come on, I'll show you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <689 StartTime="3271846" EndTime="3274004" PlainText="I'll show you how. Come on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <690 StartTime="3274098" EndTime="3276933" PlainText="Jack! No! Jack! No!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <691 StartTime="3277018" EndTime="3279176" PlainText="Wait, Jack. No, Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <692 StartTime="3279270" EndTime="3282639" PlainText="- I couldn’t possibly, Jack. - Watch closely." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <693 StartTime="3284025" EndTime="3286776" PlainText="- That's disgusting! - Your turn." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <694 StartTime="3289405" EndTime="3290734" PlainText="Pitiful!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <695 StartTime="3290823" EndTime="3295450" PlainText="You really gotta hawk it back. Use your arms. Arc your neck." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <696 StartTime="3296496" EndTime="3299165" PlainText="See the range on that thing?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <697 StartTime="3299248" EndTime="3301537" PlainText="(Jack) Okay, go." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <698 StartTime="3304670" EndTime="3309831" PlainText="You gotta work on it. Really try and hawk it up and get some body to it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <699 StartTime="3309926" EndTime="3311088" PlainText="(snorting)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <700 StartTime="3317600" EndTime="3319474" PlainText="Mother." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <701 StartTime="3324148" EndTime="3326686" PlainText="May I introduce Jack Dawson?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <702 StartTime="3326776" EndTime="3328852" PlainText="Charmed, I'm sure." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <703 StartTime="3333991" EndTime="3338819" PlainText="(Rose) The others were gracious about the man who saved my life..." FormattedText="{(Rose) The others were gracious about the man who saved my life... Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <704 StartTime="3338913" EndTime="3342993" PlainText="...but my mother looked at him like an insect,..." FormattedText="{...but my mother looked at him like an insect,... Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <705 StartTime="3343084" EndTime="3345373" PlainText="...a dangerous insect,..." FormattedText="{...a dangerous insect,... Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <706 StartTime="3345461" EndTime="3347668" PlainText="...which must be squashed quickly." FormattedText="{...which must be squashed quickly. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <707 StartTime="3347755" EndTime="3352382" PlainText="Sounds like you're a good man to have around in a sticky spot." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <708 StartTime="3352468" EndTime="3354508" PlainText="(trumpet playing fanfare)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <709 StartTime="3354595" EndTime="3358260" PlainText="Why do they always announce dinner like a damn cavalry charge?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <710 StartTime="3359600" EndTime="3361676" PlainText="Shall we go dress, Mother?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <711 StartTime="3362228" EndTime="3364304" PlainText="See you at dinner, Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <712 StartTime="3365439" EndTime="3367099" PlainText="Uh, son?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <713 StartTime="3367191" EndTime="3369184" PlainText="Son!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <714 StartTime="3369277" EndTime="3371684" PlainText="Do you have any idea what you're doing?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <715 StartTime="3371779" EndTime="3373653" PlainText="Not really." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <716 StartTime="3373739" EndTime="3377274" PlainText="Well, you're about to go into the snakepit." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <717 StartTime="3378077" EndTime="3380615" PlainText="What are you planning to wear?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <718 StartTime="3382748" EndTime="3384788" PlainText="I figured." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <719 StartTime="3384876" EndTime="3386915" PlainText="Come on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <720 StartTime="3388421" EndTime="3393083" PlainText="I was right! You and my son are just about the same size." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <721 StartTime="3393176" EndTime="3395085" PlainText="Pretty close." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <722 StartTime="3396721" EndTime="3398464" PlainText="(whistles)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <723 StartTime="3398556" EndTime="3401261" PlainText="You shine up like a new penny!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <724 StartTime="3410985" EndTime="3413061" PlainText="Good evening, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <725 StartTime="3420536" EndTime="3424700" PlainText="(orchestra playing ''On the Beautiful Blue Danube'')" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <726 StartTime="3464664" EndTime="3466206" PlainText="Good evening." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <727 StartTime="3472004" EndTime="3474330" PlainText="Hello." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <728 StartTime="3476342" EndTime="3480589" PlainText="(Cal) There are several thousand tons of Hockley steel..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <729 StartTime="3480680" EndTime="3484298" PlainText="...in this very ship." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <730 StartTime="3484392" EndTime="3488520" PlainText="Then we'll know who to hold accountable if there's a problem." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <731 StartTime="3488604" EndTime="3490063" PlainText="There is the Countess." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <732 StartTime="3490148" EndTime="3492187" PlainText="- Hello, my dear. - Good evening, Cal." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <733 StartTime="3492275" EndTime="3495110" PlainText="(Cal) So good to see you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <734 StartTime="3519093" EndTime="3523387" PlainText="I saw that in a nickelodeon once and I always wanted to do it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <735 StartTime="3535151" EndTime="3537190" PlainText="(Ruth) I'll see you at dinner." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <736 StartTime="3537278" EndTime="3538393" PlainText="Darling?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <737 StartTime="3538488" EndTime="3541275" PlainText="Surely you remember Mr. Dawson?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <738 StartTime="3541741" EndTime="3543200" PlainText="Dawson?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <739 StartTime="3543284" EndTime="3548112" PlainText="Well, it's amazing! You could almost pass for a gentleman!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <740 StartTime="3549207" EndTime="3550452" PlainText="Almost." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <741 StartTime="3550541" EndTime="3552415" PlainText="Extraordinary!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <742 StartTime="3563513" EndTime="3566632" PlainText="(Ruth) My dear, it's delightful to see you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <743 StartTime="3566724" EndTime="3570223" PlainText="What a remarkable voyage this is! Mad, isn't it?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <744 StartTime="3571646" EndTime="3574018" PlainText="There's the Countess of Rothes." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <745 StartTime="3575900" EndTime="3580645" PlainText="And, um... that's John Jacob Astor, the richest man on the ship." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <746 StartTime="3580738" EndTime="3585614" PlainText="His little wifey, Madeleine, is my age and in a delicate condition." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <747 StartTime="3585701" EndTime="3588371" PlainText="See how she's trying to hide it?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <748 StartTime="3588454" EndTime="3590494" PlainText="- Quite the scandal. - Hmm!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <749 StartTime="3590581" EndTime="3595124" PlainText="And that's Benjamin Guggenheim and his mistress Madame Aubert." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <750 StartTime="3595211" EndTime="3597832" PlainText="Mrs. Guggenheim is at home with the children." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <751 StartTime="3597922" EndTime="3602501" PlainText="And over here we have Sir Cosmo and Lucille, Lady Duff-Gordon." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <752 StartTime="3602593" EndTime="3604882" PlainText="She designs naughty lingerie." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <753 StartTime="3604971" EndTime="3607047" PlainText="Very popular with the royals." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <754 StartTime="3607140" EndTime="3609891" PlainText="Congratulations, Hockley. She's splendid." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <755 StartTime="3609976" EndTime="3611803" PlainText="Why, thank you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <756 StartTime="3611894" EndTime="3613970" PlainText="Care to escort a lady to dinner?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <757 StartTime="3614063" EndTime="3615641" PlainText="Certainly." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <758 StartTime="3616399" EndTime="3618391" PlainText="Sweet pea?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <759 StartTime="3618484" EndTime="3619895" PlainText="(Cal) Sweet pea!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <760 StartTime="3619986" EndTime="3623271" PlainText="Ain't nothin' to it, Jack. They love money,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <761 StartTime="3623364" EndTime="3627825" PlainText="...so just pretend like you own a goldmine and you're in the club." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <762 StartTime="3628995" EndTime="3630868" PlainText="Hey, Astor!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <763 StartTime="3631330" EndTime="3634201" PlainText="Well, hello, Molly! Nice to see you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <764 StartTime="3634292" EndTime="3637162" PlainText="JJ, Madeleine, I'd like you to meet Jack Dawson." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <765 StartTime="3637253" EndTime="3638664" PlainText="- How do you do? - Pleasure." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <766 StartTime="3638754" EndTime="3639786" PlainText="Hello, Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <767 StartTime="3639881" EndTime="3641873" PlainText="Are you of the Boston Dawsons?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <768 StartTime="3641966" EndTime="3645501" PlainText="No... the Chippewa Falls Dawsons, actually." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <769 StartTime="3645595" EndTime="3647338" PlainText="Oh, yes..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <770 StartTime="3649432" EndTime="3654058" PlainText="(Rose) He must have been nervous, but he never faltered." FormattedText="{(Rose) He must have been nervous, but he never faltered. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <771 StartTime="3654145" EndTime="3656351" PlainText="They assumed he was one of them." FormattedText="{They assumed he was one of them. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <772 StartTime="3656439" EndTime="3659191" PlainText="Heir to a railroad fortune, perhaps." FormattedText="{Heir to a railroad fortune, perhaps. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <773 StartTime="3660193" EndTime="3664107" PlainText="New money, obviously, but still a member of the club." FormattedText="{New money, obviously, but still a member of the club. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <774 StartTime="3664530" EndTime="3668195" PlainText="Mother, of course, could always be counted upon." FormattedText="{Mother, of course, could always be counted upon. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <775 StartTime="3668284" EndTime="3671735" PlainText="Tell us of the accommodations in steerage, Mr. Dawson." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <776 StartTime="3671829" EndTime="3673703" PlainText="I hear they're quite good." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <777 StartTime="3673790" EndTime="3676245" PlainText="The best I've seen, ma'am." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <778 StartTime="3676334" EndTime="3678373" PlainText="Hardly any rats." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <779 StartTime="3678461" EndTime="3680537" PlainText="(laughter)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <780 StartTime="3681255" EndTime="3684505" PlainText="Mr. Dawson is joining us from the third class." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <781 StartTime="3684592" EndTime="3687676" PlainText="He was of some assistance to my fiancée last night." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <782 StartTime="3687762" EndTime="3690004" PlainText="Mr. Dawson is quite a fine artist." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <783 StartTime="3690097" EndTime="3693264" PlainText="He was kind enough to show me some of his work today." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <784 StartTime="3693351" EndTime="3696435" PlainText="Rose and I differ somewhat in our definition of fine art." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <785 StartTime="3696521" EndTime="3698312" PlainText="Not to impugn your work, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <786 StartTime="3700024" EndTime="3701684" PlainText="(clears throat)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <787 StartTime="3703402" EndTime="3705858" PlainText="(Ismay) She may be mine on paper..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <788 StartTime="3705947" EndTime="3708698" PlainText="...but in the eyes of God she belongs to Thomas Andrews." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <789 StartTime="3708783" EndTime="3710325" PlainText="Are these all for me?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <790 StartTime="3710409" EndTime="3712983" PlainText="Start from the outside and work your way in." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <791 StartTime="3713079" EndTime="3717207" PlainText="- He knows every rivet in her. - Your ship is a wonder, Mr. Andrews." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <792 StartTime="3717291" EndTime="3718834" PlainText="Thank you, Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <793 StartTime="3721671" EndTime="3725455" PlainText="- How do you take your caviar, sir? - No caviar for me, thanks." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <794 StartTime="3725550" EndTime="3727092" PlainText="Never did like it much." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <795 StartTime="3728261" EndTime="3731464" PlainText="And where exactly do you live, Mr. Dawson?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <796 StartTime="3731556" EndTime="3734806" PlainText="Well, right now my address is the RMS Titanic." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <797 StartTime="3734892" EndTime="3737181" PlainText="After that I'm on God's good humour." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <798 StartTime="3737270" EndTime="3739595" PlainText="And how is it you have means to travel?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <799 StartTime="3739689" EndTime="3744647" PlainText="I work my way from place to place. You know, tramp steamers and such." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <800 StartTime="3744735" EndTime="3748733" PlainText="But I won my ticket on Titanic here at a lucky hand at poker." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <801 StartTime="3748823" EndTime="3750531" PlainText="A very lucky hand." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <802 StartTime="3751284" EndTime="3753323" PlainText="All life is a game of luck." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <803 StartTime="3753411" EndTime="3757455" PlainText="A real man makes his own luck, Archie. Right, Dawson?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <804 StartTime="3757540" EndTime="3758915" PlainText="Mm." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <805 StartTime="3759000" EndTime="3763875" PlainText="And you find that sort of rootless existence appealing, do you?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <806 StartTime="3765590" EndTime="3767629" PlainText="Well, yes, ma'am, I do." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <807 StartTime="3767717" EndTime="3771631" PlainText="I mean... Got everything I need right here with me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <808 StartTime="3771721" EndTime="3774472" PlainText="Got air in my lungs and a few sheets of paper." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <809 StartTime="3774557" EndTime="3778305" PlainText="I love waking up in the morning not knowing what's gonna happen..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <810 StartTime="3778394" EndTime="3782606" PlainText="...or who I'm gonna meet, where I'm gonna wind up." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <811 StartTime="3782690" EndTime="3785062" PlainText="The other night I slept under a bridge." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <812 StartTime="3785151" EndTime="3788068" PlainText="Now I'm on the grandest ship in the world..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <813 StartTime="3788154" EndTime="3791024" PlainText="...having champagne with you fine people." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <814 StartTime="3791115" EndTime="3795528" PlainText="I figure life’s a gift and I don't intend on wasting it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <815 StartTime="3795620" EndTime="3799831" PlainText="You never know what hand you're gonna get dealt next." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <816 StartTime="3799916" EndTime="3803700" PlainText="You learn to take life as it comes at you,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <817 StartTime="3804462" EndTime="3806501" PlainText="...to make each day count." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <818 StartTime="3806589" EndTime="3808297" PlainText="Well said, Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <819 StartTime="3808382" EndTime="3809663" PlainText="Hear, hear!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <820 StartTime="3809759" EndTime="3812297" PlainText="To making it count." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <821 StartTime="3813805" EndTime="3815881" PlainText="(All) To making it count." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <822 StartTime="3815973" EndTime="3817005" PlainText="Bravo!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <823 StartTime="3820603" EndTime="3822679" PlainText="(Molly laughing)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <824 StartTime="3824273" EndTime="3829066" PlainText="Mr. Brown had no idea I'd hidden the money in the stove!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <825 StartTime="3829153" EndTime="3833198" PlainText="So he comes home drunk as a pig and he lights a fire!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <826 StartTime="3835993" EndTime="3838828" PlainText="Next it'll be brandies in the smoking room." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <827 StartTime="3840790" EndTime="3842996" PlainText="Join me in a brandy, gentlemen?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <828 StartTime="3843084" EndTime="3845657" PlainText="Now they retreat into a cloud of smoke..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <829 StartTime="3845753" EndTime="3849371" PlainText="...and congratulate each other on being masters of the universe." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <830 StartTime="3849465" EndTime="3851588" PlainText="Ladies, thank you for your company." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <831 StartTime="3851676" EndTime="3855508" PlainText="- May I escort you to the cabin? - No, I'll stay here." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <832 StartTime="3855596" EndTime="3857340" PlainText="Here you go, Molly." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <833 StartTime="3858391" EndTime="3860680" PlainText="(Archie) Joining us, Dawson?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <834 StartTime="3860768" EndTime="3863140" PlainText="Don't want to stay with the women, do you?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <835 StartTime="3863229" EndTime="3866016" PlainText="No, thanks. I've gotta be heading back." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <836 StartTime="3866107" EndTime="3871065" PlainText="Probably best. It'll be all business and politics. Wouldn’t interest you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <837 StartTime="3872196" EndTime="3874770" PlainText="But, Dawson... Good of you to come." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <838 StartTime="3879620" EndTime="3881660" PlainText="Jack, must you go?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <839 StartTime="3881747" EndTime="3884285" PlainText="Time for me to row with the other slaves." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <840 StartTime="3887587" EndTime="3890042" PlainText="Good night, Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <841 StartTime="3916157" EndTime="3917948" PlainText="(clock chiming)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <842 StartTime="3929462" EndTime="3932131" PlainText="So you wanna go to a real party?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <843 StartTime="3941474" EndTime="3943431" PlainText="Is okay I put my hand here?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <844 StartTime="3943518" EndTime="3944549" PlainText="Okay!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <845 StartTime="3958157" EndTime="3960114" PlainText="Talla frikken svenska?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <846 StartTime="3960201" EndTime="3961316" PlainText="What?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <847 StartTime="3961410" EndTime="3963284" PlainText="(repeats phrase)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <848 StartTime="3963371" EndTime="3965447" PlainText="I can't understand you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <849 StartTime="3975550" EndTime="3976925" PlainText="(glass shatters)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <850 StartTime="3991232" EndTime="3992726" PlainText="Hey...!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <851 StartTime="3992817" EndTime="3994856" PlainText="Bravo! Bravo!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <852 StartTime="3994944" EndTime="3997186" PlainText="Come on, guys, let’s go! Ho!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <853 StartTime="3997280" EndTime="4000530" PlainText="I'm gonna dance with her now, all right?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <854 StartTime="4000616" EndTime="4001696" PlainText="Come on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <855 StartTime="4001784" EndTime="4003278" PlainText="Come on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <856 StartTime="4003369" EndTime="4004400" PlainText="Come with me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <857 StartTime="4004495" EndTime="4006452" PlainText="Jack... Jack, wait!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <858 StartTime="4008124" EndTime="4009748" PlainText="I can't do this." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <859 StartTime="4009834" EndTime="4011910" PlainText="We have to get a bit closer." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <860 StartTime="4012003" EndTime="4013663" PlainText="like this." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <861 StartTime="4015923" EndTime="4018331" PlainText="You're still my best girl, Cora." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <862 StartTime="4020970" EndTime="4025134" PlainText="- I don't know the steps. - Neither do I. Just go with it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <863 StartTime="4025224" EndTime="4027051" PlainText="Don't think." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <864 StartTime="4045745" EndTime="4048662" PlainText="Wait, Jack! Wait! Stop, Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <865 StartTime="4058591" EndTime="4059670" PlainText="Wait!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <866 StartTime="4099549" EndTime="4100877" PlainText="(Jack) Yeah!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <867 StartTime="4100967" EndTime="4102758" PlainText="Jack... No!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <868 StartTime="4102844" EndTime="4105251" PlainText="Whaaa..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <869 StartTime="4108307" EndTime="4112471" PlainText="...jurisdiction of the Sherman Act, so my lawyers will argue." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <870 StartTime="4112562" EndTime="4116144" PlainText="That's what Rockefeller said, but the court is not swallowing it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <871 StartTime="4136169" EndTime="4137663" PlainText="What?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <872 StartTime="4137753" EndTime="4141122" PlainText="You think a first-class girl can't drink?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <873 StartTime="4141215" EndTime="4143255" PlainText="Get outta here!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <874 StartTime="4143342" EndTime="4145501" PlainText="You all right?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <875 StartTime="4149348" EndTime="4151637" PlainText="Two out of three, two out of three." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <876 StartTime="4151726" EndTime="4152924" PlainText="So..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <877 StartTime="4154270" EndTime="4156642" PlainText="You think you're big, tough men?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <878 StartTime="4156731" EndTime="4158854" PlainText="let’s see you do this." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <879 StartTime="4160276" EndTime="4162565" PlainText="Hold this for me, Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <880 StartTime="4162653" EndTime="4164527" PlainText="Hold it up." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <881 StartTime="4178461" EndTime="4179492" PlainText="Ow!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <882 StartTime="4180505" EndTime="4182544" PlainText="Jesus, Mary and Joseph!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <883 StartTime="4182632" EndTime="4185835" PlainText="- You all right? - I haven't done that in years!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <884 StartTime="4193893" EndTime="4196810" PlainText="Go see Maggie, lads. let’s go!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <885 StartTime="4222505" EndTime="4224581" PlainText="Coffee, sir?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <886 StartTime="4232306" EndTime="4235640" PlainText="I had hoped you would come to me last night." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <887 StartTime="4238146" EndTime="4240387" PlainText="I was tired." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <888 StartTime="4240481" EndTime="4244609" PlainText="Your exertions below decks were no doubt exhausting." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <889 StartTime="4246904" EndTime="4252243" PlainText="I see you had that undertaker of a manservant follow me. How typical." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <890 StartTime="4252326" EndTime="4256988" PlainText="You will never behave like that again, Rose. Do you understand?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <891 StartTime="4257123" EndTime="4261452" PlainText="I'm not a foreman in one of your mills that you can command." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <892 StartTime="4261544" EndTime="4264296" PlainText="I'm your fiancée." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <893 StartTime="4265882" EndTime="4267921" PlainText="My fiancée? My fiancée?!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <894 StartTime="4268009" EndTime="4271378" PlainText="Yes, you are, and my wife!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <895 StartTime="4271471" EndTime="4276216" PlainText="My wife in practice if not yet by law, so you will honour me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <896 StartTime="4276309" EndTime="4279678" PlainText="You will honour me the way a wife is required to." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <897 StartTime="4279770" EndTime="4281680" PlainText="I will not be made a fool of." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <898 StartTime="4281772" EndTime="4284098" PlainText="Is this in any way unclear?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <899 StartTime="4285193" EndTime="4286438" PlainText="No." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <900 StartTime="4286527" EndTime="4287938" PlainText="Good." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <901 StartTime="4288029" EndTime="4290068" PlainText="Excuse me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <902 StartTime="4294869" EndTime="4296778" PlainText="Miss Rose!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <903 StartTime="4296871" EndTime="4300619" PlainText="- We had a little... accident. - That's all right, Miss Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <904 StartTime="4300708" EndTime="4303579" PlainText="I'm sorry, Trudy. let me help you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <905 StartTime="4303669" EndTime="4305745" PlainText="It's all right, miss." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <906 StartTime="4311344" EndTime="4313420" PlainText="It's all right, miss." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <907 StartTime="4318476" EndTime="4319591" PlainText="Tea, Trudy." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <908 StartTime="4319727" EndTime="4321767" PlainText="Yes, ma'am." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <909 StartTime="4337870" EndTime="4342082" PlainText="You're not to see that boy again. Do you understand me?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <910 StartTime="4342166" EndTime="4344871" PlainText="Rose, I forbid it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <911 StartTime="4344961" EndTime="4348828" PlainText="Oh, stop it, Mother. You’ll give yourself a nosebleed." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <912 StartTime="4348965" EndTime="4350874" PlainText="This is not a game." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <913 StartTime="4350967" EndTime="4354881" PlainText="Our situation is precarious. You know the money's gone." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <914 StartTime="4354971" EndTime="4357509" PlainText="Of course I know it's gone." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <915 StartTime="4357640" EndTime="4359680" PlainText="You remind me every day." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <916 StartTime="4359767" EndTime="4363551" PlainText="Your father left us nothing but a legacy of bad debts..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <917 StartTime="4363646" EndTime="4365224" PlainText="...hidden by a good name." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <918 StartTime="4365314" EndTime="4368399" PlainText="That name is the only card we have to play." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <919 StartTime="4368484" EndTime="4370560" PlainText="I don't understand you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <920 StartTime="4371070" EndTime="4373561" PlainText="It is a fine match with Hockley." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <921 StartTime="4373656" EndTime="4375696" PlainText="It will ensure our survival." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <922 StartTime="4375783" EndTime="4378357" PlainText="How can you put this on my shoulders?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <923 StartTime="4378452" EndTime="4380160" PlainText="Why are you being so selfish?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <924 StartTime="4380246" EndTime="4382737" PlainText="I'm being selfish?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <925 StartTime="4386252" EndTime="4389835" PlainText="Do you want to see me working as a seamstress?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <926 StartTime="4390965" EndTime="4393373" PlainText="Is that what you want?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <927 StartTime="4395553" EndTime="4398589" PlainText="To see our fine things sold at auction?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <928 StartTime="4398681" EndTime="4401717" PlainText="Our memories scattered to the winds!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <929 StartTime="4412945" EndTime="4415567" PlainText="It's so unfair." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <930 StartTime="4415656" EndTime="4417732" PlainText="Of course it's unfair." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <931 StartTime="4418993" EndTime="4421069" PlainText="We're women." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <932 StartTime="4422955" EndTime="4425446" PlainText="Our choices are never easy." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <933 StartTime="4432131" EndTime="4434124" PlainText="Hmm?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <934 StartTime="4446604" EndTime="4450768" PlainText="â™ª Protect them by thy guardian hand..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <935 StartTime="4450858" EndTime="4456398" PlainText="â™ª ...from every peril on the land." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <936 StartTime="4457740" EndTime="4462236" PlainText="â™ª O spirit, whom the father sent..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <937 StartTime="4462328" EndTime="4466373" PlainText="â™ª ...to spread across the firmament." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <938 StartTime="4466457" EndTime="4471119" PlainText="â™ª O wind of heaven, by thy might..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <939 StartTime="4471420" EndTime="4476415" PlainText="â™ª ...save all who dare the eagle's flight." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <940 StartTime="4476509" EndTime="4480720" PlainText="â™ªAnd keep them by thy watchful..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <941 StartTime="4482765" EndTime="4484592" PlainText="Hello, Mr. Andrews." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <942 StartTime="4484684" EndTime="4486557" PlainText="Hello, Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <943 StartTime="4494318" EndTime="4497485" PlainText="- Sir... - I just need to talk to somebody..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <944 StartTime="4497572" EndTime="4500027" PlainText="You're not supposed to be in here." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <945 StartTime="4500116" EndTime="4502155" PlainText="â™ª ...fire and foe,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <946 StartTime="4502243" EndTime="4503654" PlainText="â™ª ...protect them..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <947 StartTime="4503744" EndTime="4506366" PlainText="- You don't remember me? - No, I don't." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <948 StartTime="4506456" EndTime="4509243" PlainText="- You’ll have to turn around. - He'll tell you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <949 StartTime="4509333" EndTime="4510662" PlainText="I just..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <950 StartTime="4510751" EndTime="4513456" PlainText="Mr. Hockley and Mrs. DeWitt Bukater..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <951 StartTime="4513546" EndTime="4517413" PlainText="...continue to be appreciative of your assistance." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <952 StartTime="4517508" EndTime="4520877" PlainText="They asked me to give you this in gratitude." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <953 StartTime="4520970" EndTime="4522630" PlainText="I don't want your money..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <954 StartTime="4522722" EndTime="4528760" PlainText="You hold a third-class ticket. Your presence here is no longer appropriate." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <955 StartTime="4528853" EndTime="4530892" PlainText="Please, I just wanna speak to Rose..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <956 StartTime="4530980" EndTime="4534764" PlainText="Gentlemen, please see that Mr. Dawson gets back to where he belongs..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <957 StartTime="4534901" EndTime="4536977" PlainText="...and that he stays there." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <958 StartTime="4537069" EndTime="4538101" PlainText="Yes, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <959 StartTime="4538154" EndTime="4540230" PlainText="Come along, you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <960 StartTime="4541908" EndTime="4545193" PlainText="â™ª O hear us when we cry to Thee..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <961 StartTime="4545369" EndTime="4550993" PlainText="â™ª ...for those in peril on the sea." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <962 StartTime="4551042" EndTime="4555040" PlainText="- Why two steering wheels? - We only use this near shore." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <963 StartTime="4555087" EndTime="4558919" PlainText="Sir, another ice warning. This one's from the Noordam." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <964 StartTime="4558966" EndTime="4561125" PlainText="Thank you, Sparks." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <965 StartTime="4562011" EndTime="4565878" PlainText="Oh, not to worry. Quite normal for this time of year." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <966 StartTime="4565932" EndTime="4570843" PlainText="In fact, we're speeding up. I've just ordered the last boilers lit." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <967 StartTime="4574607" EndTime="4577691" PlainText="Okay, son, wind it up tight like I showed you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <968 StartTime="4577735" EndTime="4579811" PlainText="Okay, let it go." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <969 StartTime="4582532" EndTime="4584489" PlainText="- Was good, wasn't it? - Quite nice." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <970 StartTime="4584534" EndTime="4586526" PlainText="That's excellent, son." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <971 StartTime="4590206" EndTime="4593622" PlainText="(Rose) Mr. Andrews, forgive me..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <972 StartTime="4594710" EndTime="4596786" PlainText="I did the sum in my head..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <973 StartTime="4596838" EndTime="4601416" PlainText="With the number of lifeboats times the capacity you mentioned..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <974 StartTime="4601467" EndTime="4604634" PlainText="...it seems there are not enough for everyone." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <975 StartTime="4604679" EndTime="4606755" PlainText="About half, actually." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <976 StartTime="4606848" EndTime="4609469" PlainText="Rose, you miss nothing, do you?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <977 StartTime="4609517" EndTime="4612434" PlainText="In fact, I put in these new type davits..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <978 StartTime="4612478" EndTime="4615349" PlainText="...which can take an extra row of boats." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <979 StartTime="4615398" EndTime="4619775" PlainText="But it was thought by some that the deck would look too cluttered..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <980 StartTime="4619819" EndTime="4622903" PlainText="...so I was overruled." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <981 StartTime="4622947" EndTime="4626197" PlainText="Waste of deck space on an unsinkable ship." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <982 StartTime="4626242" EndTime="4628151" PlainText="Sleep soundly, young Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <983 StartTime="4628202" EndTime="4631452" PlainText="I have built you a good ship, strong and true." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <984 StartTime="4631497" EndTime="4633739" PlainText="She is all the lifeboat you need." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <985 StartTime="4633791" EndTime="4635867" PlainText="Just keep heading aft." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <986 StartTime="4635918" EndTime="4637792" PlainText="Come on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <987 StartTime="4641466" EndTime="4643921" PlainText="Jack, this is impossible." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <988 StartTime="4643968" EndTime="4646044" PlainText="I can't see you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <989 StartTime="4646095" EndTime="4649215" PlainText="- I need to talk to you. - No, Jack, no." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <990 StartTime="4649849" EndTime="4651925" PlainText="Jack, I'm engaged." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <991 StartTime="4653644" EndTime="4655720" PlainText="I'm marrying Cal." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <992 StartTime="4655771" EndTime="4657598" PlainText="I love Cal." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <993 StartTime="4659984" EndTime="4663104" PlainText="Rose... you're no picnic." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <994 StartTime="4663988" EndTime="4666740" PlainText="You're a spoiled little brat, even." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <995 StartTime="4666782" EndTime="4672287" PlainText="But you're the most amazingly astounding, wonderful girl,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <996 StartTime="4672330" EndTime="4673788" PlainText="...woman,..."
