FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <997 StartTime="4673831" EndTime="4676666" PlainText="- ...that I've ever known, and... - Jack..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <998 StartTime="4676709" EndTime="4678785" PlainText="let me try and get this out." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <999 StartTime="4678836" EndTime="4680663" PlainText="You're ama..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1000 StartTime="4681923" EndTime="4685422" PlainText="I'm not an idiot. I know how the world works." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1001 StartTime="4685468" EndTime="4690260" PlainText="I've got ten bucks in my pocket and I have nothing to offer you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1002 StartTime="4690306" EndTime="4692382" PlainText="I understand." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1003 StartTime="4692683" EndTime="4694759" PlainText="But I'm too involved now." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1004 StartTime="4694811" EndTime="4696887" PlainText="You jump, I jump, remember?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1005 StartTime="4696938" EndTime="4702478" PlainText="I can't turn away without knowing you'll be all right. That's all I want." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1006 StartTime="4704320" EndTime="4706396" PlainText="Well, I'm fine." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1007 StartTime="4706948" EndTime="4709783" PlainText="I'll be fine... Really." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1008 StartTime="4709826" EndTime="4711699" PlainText="Really?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1009 StartTime="4713913" EndTime="4715989" PlainText="I don't think so." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1010 StartTime="4716040" EndTime="4720916" PlainText="They've got you trapped, Rose, and you'll die if you don't break free." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1011 StartTime="4720962" EndTime="4724212" PlainText="Maybe not right away because you're strong, but..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1012 StartTime="4724257" EndTime="4727542" PlainText="...that fire that I love about you, Rose,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1013 StartTime="4727593" EndTime="4730298" PlainText="...that fire is gonna burn out." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1014 StartTime="4734058" EndTime="4737059" PlainText="It's not up to you to save me, Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1015 StartTime="4739480" EndTime="4741556" PlainText="You're right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1016 StartTime="4741899" EndTime="4744473" PlainText="Only you can do that." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1017 StartTime="4749407" EndTime="4751483" PlainText="I'm going back." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1018 StartTime="4751534" EndTime="4753610" PlainText="leave me alone." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1019 StartTime="4763629" EndTime="4768007" PlainText="Tell Lucille about the disaster you had with the stationer's." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1020 StartTime="4768050" EndTime="4770921" PlainText="The invitations had to be sent back twice." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1021 StartTime="4770970" EndTime="4772429" PlainText="Oh, my dear!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1022 StartTime="4772472" EndTime="4776552" PlainText="And the dreadful bridesmaids' gowns - what an odyssey that has been!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1023 StartTime="4776601" EndTime="4779602" PlainText="Rose decided she wanted lavender." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1024 StartTime="4779645" EndTime="4782849" PlainText="She knows I detest the colour, so she did it to spite me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1025 StartTime="4782899" EndTime="4785057" PlainText="If only you'd come to me sooner." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1026 StartTime="4785109" EndTime="4788110" PlainText="Ruth saw some of my designs in ''la Mode Illustrée''." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1027 StartTime="4788154" EndTime="4791439" PlainText="They were for the Duchess of Marlborough’s youngest." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1028 StartTime="4791491" EndTime="4794824" PlainText="They were quite charming. But I think you'll agree, my dear,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1029 StartTime="4794869" EndTime="4799198" PlainText="...together we've created something of a phoenix from the ashes!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1030 StartTime="4811844" EndTime="4813920" PlainText="Hello, Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1031 StartTime="4819393" EndTime="4821469" PlainText="I changed my mind." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1032 StartTime="4826609" EndTime="4830192" PlainText="- They said you might be... - Shh..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1033 StartTime="4830863" EndTime="4832939" PlainText="Give me your hand." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1034 StartTime="4840373" EndTime="4843243" PlainText="Now close your eyes." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1035 StartTime="4843292" EndTime="4845368" PlainText="Go on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1036 StartTime="4847797" EndTime="4849873" PlainText="Step up." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1037 StartTime="4852468" EndTime="4854710" PlainText="Now hold on to the railing." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1038 StartTime="4854762" EndTime="4857763" PlainText="- Keep your eyes closed. Don't peek. - I'm not." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1039 StartTime="4859350" EndTime="4861426" PlainText="Step up onto the rail." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1040 StartTime="4865189" EndTime="4867265" PlainText="Hold on... Hold on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1041 StartTime="4867316" EndTime="4869558" PlainText="Keep your eyes closed." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1042 StartTime="4869610" EndTime="4871686" PlainText="Do you trust me?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1043 StartTime="4871737" EndTime="4873730" PlainText="I trust you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1044 StartTime="4882915" EndTime="4884540" PlainText="All right..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1045 StartTime="4884584" EndTime="4886660" PlainText="Open your eyes." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1046 StartTime="4892800" EndTime="4894460" PlainText="I'm flying!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1047 StartTime="4894510" EndTime="4896218" PlainText="Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1048 StartTime="4920578" EndTime="4924741" PlainText="â™ª Come, Josephine, on my flying machine,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1049 StartTime="4924791" EndTime="4929702" PlainText="â™ª ...going up, she goes, up, she goes..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1050 StartTime="4975508" EndTime="4979636" PlainText="That was the last time Titanic ever saw daylight." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1051 StartTime="4979679" EndTime="4983344" PlainText="So we're up to dusk the night of the sinking." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1052 StartTime="4983391" EndTime="4985467" PlainText="Six hours to go." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1053 StartTime="4985518" EndTime="4990678" PlainText="Smith's standing there, the iceberg warning in his fucking hand,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1054 StartTime="4990731" EndTime="4993436" PlainText="...and he's ordering more speed." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1055 StartTime="4993484" EndTime="4997067" PlainText="26 years of experience working against him." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1056 StartTime="4997113" EndTime="5001989" PlainText="He figures anything big enough to sink the ship they'll see in time to turn." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1057 StartTime="5002034" EndTime="5007159" PlainText="But the ship's too big with too small a rudder. Doesn't corner worth a damn." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1058 StartTime="5007206" EndTime="5009413" PlainText="Everything he knows is wrong." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1059 StartTime="5021179" EndTime="5024298" PlainText="It's quite proper, I assure you!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1060 StartTime="5024348" EndTime="5026424" PlainText="This is the sitting room." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1061 StartTime="5027477" EndTime="5029849" PlainText="- Will this light do? - What?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1062 StartTime="5029896" EndTime="5032102" PlainText="Don't artists need good light?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1063 StartTime="5032190" EndTime="5035356" PlainText="(French accent) I am not used to working in such..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1064 StartTime="5035401" EndTime="5037026" PlainText="...horrible conditions." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1065 StartTime="5037737" EndTime="5039611" PlainText="Monet!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1066 StartTime="5039989" EndTime="5042990" PlainText="- Do you know his work? - Of course!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1067 StartTime="5043075" EndTime="5045282" PlainText="look at his use of colour here!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1068 StartTime="5045328" EndTime="5047320" PlainText="I know, it's extraordinary." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1069 StartTime="5049248" EndTime="5053328" PlainText="Cal insists on carting this hideous thing everywhere." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1070 StartTime="5053836" EndTime="5056837" PlainText="Should we be expecting him any time soon?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1071 StartTime="5057173" EndTime="5060458" PlainText="Not as long as the cigars and brandy hold out." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1072 StartTime="5062678" EndTime="5064754" PlainText="That's nice!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1073 StartTime="5064806" EndTime="5067261" PlainText="What is it? A sapphire?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1074 StartTime="5067308" EndTime="5069265" PlainText="A diamond." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1075 StartTime="5069310" EndTime="5071101" PlainText="A very rare diamond." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1076 StartTime="5073189" EndTime="5077187" PlainText="Jack, I want you to draw me like one of your French girls..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1077 StartTime="5078236" EndTime="5080275" PlainText="...wearing this." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1078 StartTime="5080321" EndTime="5081519" PlainText="All right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1079 StartTime="5083199" EndTime="5085275" PlainText="Wearing only this." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1080 StartTime="5120695" EndTime="5122522" PlainText="The last thing I need..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1081 StartTime="5122613" EndTime="5126943" PlainText="...is another picture of me looking like a porcelain doll." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1082 StartTime="5128286" EndTime="5130409" PlainText="As a paying customer..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1083 StartTime="5132373" EndTime="5134911" PlainText="...I expect to get what I want." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1084 StartTime="5152268" EndTime="5154937" PlainText="Over on the bed... the couch." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1085 StartTime="5163237" EndTime="5165029" PlainText="Go... Lie down." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1086 StartTime="5167909" EndTime="5169948" PlainText="Tell me when it looks right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1087 StartTime="5169994" EndTime="5172699" PlainText="Put your arm back the way it was." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1088 StartTime="5172747" EndTime="5174241" PlainText="Right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1089 StartTime="5174290" EndTime="5178157" PlainText="Put that other arm up... That hand right by your face." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1090 StartTime="5178211" EndTime="5180287" PlainText="Right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1091 StartTime="5181672" EndTime="5183998" PlainText="Now, head down..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1092 StartTime="5186260" EndTime="5188336" PlainText="Eyes to me. Keep them on me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1093 StartTime="5189180" EndTime="5191256" PlainText="And try to stay still." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1094 StartTime="5210576" EndTime="5212035" PlainText="So serious!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1095 StartTime="5253703" EndTime="5258199" PlainText="I believe you are blushing, Mr. Big Artiste." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1096 StartTime="5261461" EndTime="5265126" PlainText="I can't imagine Monsieur Monet blushing." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1097 StartTime="5265173" EndTime="5267628" PlainText="He does landscapes." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1098 StartTime="5267675" EndTime="5270878" PlainText="- Just relax your face. - Sorry." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1099 StartTime="5270928" EndTime="5273004" PlainText="No laughing." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1100 StartTime="5303169" EndTime="5306289" PlainText="My heart was pounding the whole time." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1101 StartTime="5306589" EndTime="5310539" PlainText="It was the most erotic moment of my life." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1102 StartTime="5314305" EndTime="5316843" PlainText="Up until then, at least." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1103 StartTime="5316891" EndTime="5318718" PlainText="So what happened next?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1104 StartTime="5318768" EndTime="5322552" PlainText="You mean... did we do it?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1105 StartTime="5324690" EndTime="5327146" PlainText="Sorry to disappoint you, Mr. Bodine." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1106 StartTime="5327193" EndTime="5329648" PlainText="Jack was very professional." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1107 StartTime="5338287" EndTime="5340161" PlainText="Thank you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1108 StartTime="5347672" EndTime="5349748" PlainText="What are you doing?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1109 StartTime="5349799" EndTime="5353417" PlainText="Will you put this back in the safe for me?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1110 StartTime="5364063" EndTime="5366139" PlainText="Would you excuse me?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1111 StartTime="5367191" EndTime="5370228" PlainText="None of the stewards have seen her." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1112 StartTime="5370278" EndTime="5372354" PlainText="This is absurd." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1113 StartTime="5372405" EndTime="5376272" PlainText="It's a ship. There's only so many places she could be." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1114 StartTime="5376325" EndTime="5378283" PlainText="Lovejoy, find her." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1115 StartTime="5395720" EndTime="5397796" PlainText="- Clear. - Yes." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1116 StartTime="5398473" EndTime="5401758" PlainText="I don't think I've ever seen such a flat calm." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1117 StartTime="5401809" EndTime="5403553" PlainText="like a millpond." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1118 StartTime="5403603" EndTime="5405679" PlainText="Not a breath of wind." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1119 StartTime="5407398" EndTime="5410233" PlainText="It will make the bergs harder to see..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1120 StartTime="5410568" EndTime="5413320" PlainText="...with no breaking water at the base." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1121 StartTime="5423664" EndTime="5425574" PlainText="Well, I'm off." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1122 StartTime="5425625" EndTime="5428958" PlainText="Maintain speed and heading, Mr. Lightoller." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1123 StartTime="5429003" EndTime="5430497" PlainText="Yes, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1124 StartTime="5441140" EndTime="5443216" PlainText="It's getting cold." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1125 StartTime="5443267" EndTime="5444892" PlainText="You look nice." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1126 StartTime="5444936" EndTime="5446560" PlainText="(Lovejoy) Miss Rose?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1127 StartTime="5446604" EndTime="5448063" PlainText="My drawings!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1128 StartTime="5454445" EndTime="5456734" PlainText="(door closes)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1129 StartTime="5478427" EndTime="5479886" PlainText="Wait!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1130 StartTime="5479929" EndTime="5481720" PlainText="Wait, wait, wait!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1131 StartTime="5481764" EndTime="5482843" PlainText="Go, go!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1132 StartTime="5482890" EndTime="5484135" PlainText="Down, down!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1133 StartTime="5491232" EndTime="5492263" PlainText="Bye!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1134 StartTime="5499699" EndTime="5500730" PlainText="Sorry!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1135 StartTime="5518134" EndTime="5520969" PlainText="Pretty tough for a valet, this fellow." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1136 StartTime="5521012" EndTime="5523882" PlainText="- Seems more like a cop. - I think he was." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1137 StartTime="5523931" EndTime="5526303" PlainText="(Jack) Oh, shit!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1138 StartTime="5531022" EndTime="5533098" PlainText="No, over here!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1139 StartTime="5533149" EndTime="5534773" PlainText="Quick!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1140 StartTime="5537445" EndTime="5539521" PlainText="(boiler blasting)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1141 StartTime="5540907" EndTime="5542567" PlainText="Now what!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1142 StartTime="5542617" EndTime="5543992" PlainText="What!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1143 StartTime="5550917" EndTime="5553586" PlainText="What are you two doing here?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1144 StartTime="5553628" EndTime="5556249" PlainText="You shouldn’t be here! It's dangerous!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1145 StartTime="5560092" EndTime="5561752" PlainText="(Jack) Carry on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1146 StartTime="5561803" EndTime="5565966" PlainText="Don't mind us! You're doing a great job! Keep up the good work!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1147 StartTime="5582156" EndTime="5584647" PlainText="look what we have here, huh?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1148 StartTime="5594335" EndTime="5596411" PlainText="(Rose clears throat)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1149 StartTime="5602385" EndTime="5604259" PlainText="Thank you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1150 StartTime="5613437" EndTime="5615229" PlainText="(honks horn)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1151 StartTime="5615273" EndTime="5617349" PlainText="Where to, miss?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1152 StartTime="5618526" EndTime="5620602" PlainText="To the stars." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1153 StartTime="5639046" EndTime="5641122" PlainText="Are you nervous?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1154 StartTime="5643426" EndTime="5645502" PlainText="No." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1155 StartTime="5661235" EndTime="5663726" PlainText="Put your hands on me, Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1156 StartTime="5686135" EndTime="5688626" PlainText="(Crewman) God, it's bloody cold." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1157 StartTime="5688679" EndTime="5692594" PlainText="You know, I can smell ice, you know... when it's near." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1158 StartTime="5694185" EndTime="5695560" PlainText="Bollocks." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1159 StartTime="5695603" EndTime="5697512" PlainText="But I can, all right?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1160 StartTime="5697563" EndTime="5700185" PlainText="Did you ever find those binoculars?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1161 StartTime="5700233" EndTime="5702902" PlainText="Haven't seen them since Southampton." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1162 StartTime="5702944" EndTime="5705613" PlainText="Well, I'll be on my rounds. Cheerio." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1163 StartTime="5737228" EndTime="5739304" PlainText="You're trembling." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1164 StartTime="5740648" EndTime="5743317" PlainText="Don't worry. I'll be all right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1165 StartTime="5764213" EndTime="5766206" PlainText="They ran down there." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1166 StartTime="5766257" EndTime="5767716" PlainText="Right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1167 StartTime="5777018" EndTime="5779094" PlainText="Anything missing?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1168 StartTime="5803586" EndTime="5805662" PlainText="I've got a better idea." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1169 StartTime="5817725" EndTime="5819267" PlainText="Gotcha!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1170 StartTime="5821354" EndTime="5823430" PlainText="(Rose laughing)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1171 StartTime="5829654" EndTime="5831860" PlainText="Did you see those guys' faces?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1172 StartTime="5832281" EndTime="5834357" PlainText="Did you see the...?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1173 StartTime="5840331" EndTime="5842869" PlainText="When the ship docks..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1174 StartTime="5842917" EndTime="5844993" PlainText="...I'm getting off with you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1175 StartTime="5845044" EndTime="5847333" PlainText="This is crazy." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1176 StartTime="5847380" EndTime="5849871" PlainText="I know! It doesn't make any sense." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1177 StartTime="5851342" EndTime="5853418" PlainText="That's why I trust it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1178 StartTime="5862019" EndTime="5865223" PlainText="Oh, yes... Here, look at this." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1179 StartTime="5865273" EndTime="5869769" PlainText="- look at that, would ya? - They're a bit warmer than we are." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1180 StartTime="5869819" EndTime="5875359" PlainText="Well, if that's what it takes for us to get warm, I'd rather not!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1181 StartTime="5886210" EndTime="5888250" PlainText="Bugger me!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1182 StartTime="5888296" EndTime="5890087" PlainText="(alarm bell clanging)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1183 StartTime="5891966" EndTime="5893081" PlainText="(phone)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1184 StartTime="5893134" EndTime="5895126" PlainText="Pick up, you bastards!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1185 StartTime="5895178" EndTime="5897847" PlainText="(phone ringing)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1186 StartTime="5897889" EndTime="5901174" PlainText="- Is there anyone there?! - Yes, what do you see?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1187 StartTime="5901225" EndTime="5902850" PlainText="Iceberg! Right ahead!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1188 StartTime="5902935" EndTime="5904727" PlainText="Thank you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1189 StartTime="5905521" EndTime="5907430" PlainText="Iceberg! Right ahead!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1190 StartTime="5907482" EndTime="5909770" PlainText="Hard to starboard!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1191 StartTime="5914822" EndTime="5916233" PlainText="(ringing)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1192 StartTime="5916282" EndTime="5918855" PlainText="(Crewman) Turn! Turn! Steady!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1193 StartTime="5920828" EndTime="5922702" PlainText="(bell clangs)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1194 StartTime="5923498" EndTime="5925122" PlainText="Full astern!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1195 StartTime="5926876" EndTime="5928335" PlainText="Hard over!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1196 StartTime="5928377" EndTime="5930453" PlainText="Helm's hard over, sir!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1197 StartTime="5932131" EndTime="5933875" PlainText="(ringing)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1198 StartTime="5933925" EndTime="5935716" PlainText="Go, lads! Go!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1199 StartTime="5942016" EndTime="5944258" PlainText="Shut all the dampers!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1200 StartTime="5944310" EndTime="5946101" PlainText="Shut them!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1201 StartTime="5946145" EndTime="5948102" PlainText="(dampers slamming)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1202 StartTime="5950066" EndTime="5951560" PlainText="Hold it!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1203 StartTime="5952693" EndTime="5953891" PlainText="Hold it!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1204 StartTime="5955321" EndTime="5958275" PlainText="Now! Engage the reversing engine!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1205 StartTime="5959700" EndTime="5961859" PlainText="(engine stops)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1206 StartTime="5967166" EndTime="5969242" PlainText="(engine restarts)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1207 StartTime="5985309" EndTime="5987682" PlainText="Why aren't they turning?!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1208 StartTime="5987728" EndTime="5989306" PlainText="Is it hard over?!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1209 StartTime="5989355" EndTime="5991763" PlainText="It is, yes, sir, hard over!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1210 StartTime="5994861" EndTime="5998693" PlainText="Come on... come on... come on..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1211 StartTime="5998739" EndTime="6000234" PlainText="Turn..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1212 StartTime="6010501" EndTime="6012245" PlainText="Yes..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1213 StartTime="6016966" EndTime="6019042" PlainText="It's going to hit!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1214 StartTime="6030229" EndTime="6031854" PlainText="Jesus Christ!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1215 StartTime="6045536" EndTime="6048288" PlainText="(glass tinkling)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1216 StartTime="6051959" EndTime="6053786" PlainText="Jesus..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1217 StartTime="6053836" EndTime="6055034" PlainText="Hard to port!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1218 StartTime="6055087" EndTime="6056630" PlainText="(Crewman) Hard to port!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1219 StartTime="6060301" EndTime="6062341" PlainText="(men screaming)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1220 StartTime="6066390" EndTime="6068264" PlainText="Get back!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1221 StartTime="6097296" EndTime="6100748" PlainText="Come on, let’s go! They're closing the doors!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1222 StartTime="6100800" EndTime="6102424" PlainText="Get out!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1223 StartTime="6103511" EndTime="6105587" PlainText="Get out! Get out!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1224 StartTime="6108683" EndTime="6110094" PlainText="Get out the door!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1225 StartTime="6110143" EndTime="6111305" PlainText="Go on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1226 StartTime="6111352" EndTime="6113179" PlainText="Come on, lads!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1227 StartTime="6113229" EndTime="6114509" PlainText="Go, lads, go!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1228 StartTime="6121821" EndTime="6122734" PlainText="Get out!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1229 StartTime="6142675" EndTime="6144050" PlainText="Oh, my God..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1230 StartTime="6144093" EndTime="6146798" PlainText="That was a close shave, weren't it?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1231 StartTime="6146846" EndTime="6150179" PlainText="Smell ice, can ya? Bleedin' Christ!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1232 StartTime="6153811" EndTime="6157014" PlainText="Note the time and enter it in the log." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1233 StartTime="6162278" EndTime="6164520" PlainText="What was that, Mr. Murdoch?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1234 StartTime="6164572" EndTime="6166778" PlainText="An iceberg, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1235 StartTime="6166824" EndTime="6170608" PlainText="I put her hard to starboard and ran the engines full astern..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1236 StartTime="6170661" EndTime="6174244" PlainText="...but it was too close. I tried to port round it, but she hit and..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1237 StartTime="6174290" EndTime="6178039" PlainText="- Close the watertight doors. - Doors are closed, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1238 StartTime="6180463" EndTime="6182835" PlainText="All stop." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1239 StartTime="6185009" EndTime="6187085" PlainText="(ringing)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1240 StartTime="6189263" EndTime="6192181" PlainText="Find the carpenter. Get him to sound the ship." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1241 StartTime="6192225" EndTime="6193256" PlainText="Yes, sir!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1242 StartTime="6196938" EndTime="6199725" PlainText="(Fabrizio) Porca puttana!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1243 StartTime="6199774" EndTime="6201850" PlainText="Che cazzo e?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1244 StartTime="6203653" EndTime="6206488" PlainText="Come on, let’s get the hell out of here!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1245 StartTime="6206531" EndTime="6208322" PlainText="Come on, hurry up!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1246 StartTime="6213037" EndTime="6216323" PlainText="Why have the engines stopped? I felt a shudder." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1247 StartTime="6216374" EndTime="6220917" PlainText="I shouldn’t worry, madam. We've likely thrown a propeller blade." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1248 StartTime="6220962" EndTime="6223879" PlainText="- May I bring you anything? - No, thank you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1249 StartTime="6228719" EndTime="6233298" PlainText="- Did you see anything? - I don't see anything now, do you?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1250 StartTime="6234308" EndTime="6238686" PlainText="If this is the direction the rats are going, that's good enough for me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1251 StartTime="6240398" EndTime="6243981" PlainText="Please, sir, please... everything's under control." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1252 StartTime="6245236" EndTime="6247905" PlainText="- You there. - Sir, there is no emergency." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1253 StartTime="6247947" EndTime="6250403" PlainText="- I have been robbed. - Get the master-at-arms." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1254 StartTime="6250449" EndTime="6253201" PlainText="- Now, you moron! - Yes, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1255 StartTime="6253244" EndTime="6255486" PlainText="(men laughing)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1256 StartTime="6257290" EndTime="6259578" PlainText="Hey, you're gonna miss the fun." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1257 StartTime="6259625" EndTime="6264121" PlainText="- Did you see what happened? - No. Apparently, it hit over there." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1258 StartTime="6265673" EndTime="6268674" PlainText="It's flooded eight feet and the mall hold is worse." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1259 StartTime="6268718" EndTime="6271921" PlainText="- Can you shore up? - Not unless the pumps get ahead." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1260 StartTime="6271971" EndTime="6275803" PlainText="- Have you seen the mall-hold damage? - No, she's already underwater." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1261 StartTime="6275850" EndTime="6277926" PlainText="This is bad." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1262 StartTime="6278102" EndTime="6280261" PlainText="We should tell Mother and Cal." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1263 StartTime="6282523" EndTime="6284812" PlainText="I think they're very good, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1264 StartTime="6285818" EndTime="6290195" PlainText="Don't touch anything. I want the entire room photographed." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1265 StartTime="6290239" EndTime="6292611" PlainText="(Rose) Just keep holding my hand." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1266 StartTime="6294827" EndTime="6297318" PlainText="We've been looking for you, miss." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1267 StartTime="6301042" EndTime="6303331" PlainText="(Rose) Well, here we go." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1268 StartTime="6308174" EndTime="6310629" PlainText="Something serious has happened." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1269 StartTime="6312094" EndTime="6314052" PlainText="Yes, it has." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1270 StartTime="6314096" EndTime="6318675" PlainText="Indeed. Two things dear to me have disappeared this evening." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1271 StartTime="6318726" EndTime="6323684" PlainText="Now that one is back, I've an idea where to find the other. Search him." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1272 StartTime="6323731" EndTime="6326602" PlainText="- Take your coat off, sir. - Now what?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1273 StartTime="6326651" EndTime="6329023" PlainText="Cal, we're in the middle of an emergency." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1274 StartTime="6329070" EndTime="6330813" PlainText="What's going on?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1275 StartTime="6330863" EndTime="6332690" PlainText="- Is this it? - That's it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1276 StartTime="6332740" EndTime="6335065" PlainText="This is horseshit!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1277 StartTime="6335117" EndTime="6337276" PlainText="Don't you believe it, Rose!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1278 StartTime="6337328" EndTime="6341824" PlainText="- He couldn’t have. - Of course he could." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1279 StartTime="6341874" EndTime="6344330" PlainText="But I was with him the whole time." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1280 StartTime="6344377" EndTime="6349086" PlainText="Perhaps he did it while you were putting your clothes back on, dear." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1281 StartTime="6349132" EndTime="6351373" PlainText="Rose, they put it in my pocket." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1282 StartTime="6351425" EndTime="6352505" PlainText="Shut up." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1283 StartTime="6352552" EndTime="6354509" PlainText="It isn't even your pocket." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1284 StartTime="6354554" EndTime="6356214" PlainText="Property of AI Ryerson." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1285 StartTime="6360434" EndTime="6364728" PlainText="- That was reported stolen. - I borrowed it. I was gonna return it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1286 StartTime="6364772" EndTime="6368936" PlainText="- We have an honest thief, do we? - You know I didn't do this, Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1287 StartTime="6368985" EndTime="6371939" PlainText="Don't you believe them, Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1288 StartTime="6371988" EndTime="6375191" PlainText="You know I didn't do it. You know I didn't do it, Rose!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1289 StartTime="6375241" EndTime="6377732" PlainText="Come on, son. There's a good lad." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1290 StartTime="6377785" EndTime="6378816" PlainText="Come on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1291 StartTime="6378870" EndTime="6381242" PlainText="You know I didn't do it! You know me!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1292 StartTime="6382957" EndTime="6386077" PlainText="(Ismay) Most unfortunate, Captain." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1293 StartTime="6388463" EndTime="6391997" PlainText="Water... 14 feet above the keel in 10 minutes..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1294 StartTime="6392425" EndTime="6395960" PlainText="...in the forepeak, in all three holds and in boiler room six." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1295 StartTime="6396012" EndTime="6397423" PlainText="That's right, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1296 StartTime="6397472" EndTime="6402180" PlainText="- When can we get under way, damn it! - That's five compartments!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1297 StartTime="6402310" EndTime="6407600" PlainText="She can stay afloat with the first four compartments breached, but not five." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1298 StartTime="6407648" EndTime="6409143" PlainText="Not five." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1299 StartTime="6409192" EndTime="6411315" PlainText="As she goes down by the head..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1300 StartTime="6411360" EndTime="6415690" PlainText="...the water will spill over the bulkheads, from one to the next." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1301 StartTime="6415740" EndTime="6418610" PlainText="Back and back. There's no stopping it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1302 StartTime="6418659" EndTime="6419655" PlainText="The pumps..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1303 StartTime="6419702" EndTime="6423616" PlainText="The pumps buy you time, but minutes only." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1304 StartTime="6423664" EndTime="6426535" PlainText="From this moment, no matter what we do,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1305 StartTime="6426584" EndTime="6429289" PlainText="...Titanic will founder." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1306 StartTime="6431631" EndTime="6433707" PlainText="But this ship can't sink." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1307 StartTime="6433758" EndTime="6436794" PlainText="She's made of iron, sir. I assure you she can,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1308 StartTime="6436844" EndTime="6439252" PlainText="...and she will." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1309 StartTime="6439305" EndTime="6441878" PlainText="It is a mathematical certainty." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1310 StartTime="6445311" EndTime="6447387" PlainText="How much time?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1311 StartTime="6453444" EndTime="6455022" PlainText="An hour..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1312 StartTime="6455071" EndTime="6457277" PlainText="Two at most." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1313 StartTime="6462036" EndTime="6464907" PlainText="And how many aboard, Mr. Murdoch?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1314 StartTime="6464956" EndTime="6467529" PlainText="2,200 souls on board, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1315 StartTime="6473548" EndTime="6477711" PlainText="Well, I believe you may get your headlines, Mr. Ismay." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1316 StartTime="6495317" EndTime="6499695" PlainText="Oh, it is a little slut, isn't it? look at me when I'm talking to you!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1317 StartTime="6499738" EndTime="6501067" PlainText="(knock at door)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1318 StartTime="6501115" EndTime="6503403" PlainText="- Mr. Hockley? - Not now! We're busy!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1319 StartTime="6503450" EndTime="6506072" PlainText="Sir, please put on your lifebelt..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1320 StartTime="6506120" EndTime="6509074" PlainText="I said not now." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1321 StartTime="6509123" EndTime="6513417" PlainText="I'm sorry but it's Captain's orders. Now, please, dress warmly." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1322 StartTime="6513460" EndTime="6515786" PlainText="It's quite cold out tonight." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1323 StartTime="6515838" EndTime="6518293" PlainText="May I suggest topcoats and hats?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1324 StartTime="6518340" EndTime="6520416" PlainText="This is ridiculous." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1325 StartTime="6521218" EndTime="6525465" PlainText="Not to worry, miss. I am sure it's just a precaution." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1326 StartTime="6525514" EndTime="6527756" PlainText="Everybody up! lifebelts on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1327 StartTime="6529268" EndTime="6530846" PlainText="What's he on about?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1328 StartTime="6530895" EndTime="6533350" PlainText="- lifebelts on! - What's the ruckus?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1329 StartTime="6533397" EndTime="6535188" PlainText="Just put your lifebelts on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1330 StartTime="6535274" EndTime="6537682" PlainText="(Crewman) CQD?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1331 StartTime="6537735" EndTime="6539608" PlainText="Sir?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1332 StartTime="6539904" EndTime="6543273" PlainText="That's right. CQD. The distress call." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1333 StartTime="6543365" EndTime="6545073" PlainText="That's our position." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1334 StartTime="6549079" EndTime="6553124" PlainText="Tell whoever responds that we're going down by the head..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1335 StartTime="6553167" EndTime="6556168" PlainText="...and need immediate assistance." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1336 StartTime="6564303" EndTime="6566177" PlainText="Blimey!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1337 StartTime="6576190" EndTime="6578811" PlainText="Keep lowering! Keep lowering!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1338 StartTime="6599129" EndTime="6600672" PlainText="Mr. Wilde!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1339 StartTime="6600714" EndTime="6602754" PlainText="Where are the passengers?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1340 StartTime="6602800" EndTime="6607628" PlainText="We moved them back inside. It's too damn cold and noisy for them." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1341 StartTime="6607680" EndTime="6608960" PlainText="(blows whistle)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1342 StartTime="6609014" EndTime="6611007" PlainText="Help with these lines!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1343 StartTime="6611058" EndTime="6614807" PlainText="(orchestra playing ''Alexander's Ragtime Band'')" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1344 StartTime="6625364" EndTime="6627440" PlainText="Care for a drink, sir?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1345 StartTime="6628909" EndTime="6632859" PlainText="Hey, sonny, what's doing? You got us all trussed up here..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1346 StartTime="6632913" EndTime="6637409" PlainText="- ...and now we're cooling our heels. - Sorry, ma'am. let me find out." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1347 StartTime="6637459" EndTime="6640579" PlainText="I don't think anybody knows what the hell's going on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1348 StartTime="6640629" EndTime="6644129" PlainText="It's the goddamned English doing everything by the... book." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1349 StartTime="6644174" EndTime="6646500" PlainText="There's no need for language, Mr. Hockley." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1350 StartTime="6646552" EndTime="6651214" PlainText="Go and turn the heaters on in our rooms. I'd like a cup of tea when I return." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1351 StartTime="6651265" EndTime="6653008" PlainText="Yes, ma'am." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1352 StartTime="6654768" EndTime="6657805" PlainText="(Man) This ship has 15 watertight barricades." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1353 StartTime="6657855" EndTime="6661473" PlainText="(Crewman) Would you put your lifebelt on, please?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1354 StartTime="6661901" EndTime="6663015" PlainText="Mr. Andrews..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1355 StartTime="6665279" EndTime="6669027" PlainText="I saw the iceberg, and I see it in your eyes." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1356 StartTime="6669074" EndTime="6671648" PlainText="Please tell me the truth." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1357 StartTime="6678500" EndTime="6680576" PlainText="The ship will sink." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1358 StartTime="6681045" EndTime="6683084" PlainText="You're certain?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1359 StartTime="6683130" EndTime="6685419" PlainText="Yes. In an hour or so..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1360 StartTime="6685883" EndTime="6689833" PlainText="...all this will be at the bottom of the Atlantic." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1361 StartTime="6689887" EndTime="6691547" PlainText="What?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1362 StartTime="6691597" EndTime="6696389" PlainText="Tell only who you must. I don't want to be responsible for a panic." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1363 StartTime="6696435" EndTime="6699187" PlainText="And get to a boat quickly. Don't wait." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1364 StartTime="6699230" EndTime="6702396" PlainText="You remember what I told you about the boats?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1365 StartTime="6705486" EndTime="6707277" PlainText="Yes..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1366 StartTime="6708405" EndTime="6710232" PlainText="I understand." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1367 StartTime="6718207" EndTime="6720034" PlainText="Over here, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1368 StartTime="6720084" EndTime="6724662" PlainText="Sir, they need you in the second-class purser's office. There's a mob up there." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1369 StartTime="6724713" EndTime="6728841" PlainText="- Go on. I'll keep an eye on him. - Aye. Right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1370 StartTime="6741564" EndTime="6746107" PlainText="Sir! Carpathia says they're making 17 knots." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1371 StartTime="6746151" EndTime="6748987" PlainText="Full steam for them, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1372 StartTime="6749029" EndTime="6752315" PlainText="- She's the only one responding? - The only one close, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1373 StartTime="6752366" EndTime="6754323" PlainText="They can be here in four hours." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1374 StartTime="6754368" EndTime="6756491" PlainText="Four hours?!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1375 StartTime="6761500" EndTime="6763576" PlainText="Thank you, Bride." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1376 StartTime="6767172" EndTime="6769249" PlainText="My God...!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1377 StartTime="6769300" EndTime="6771376" PlainText="(crewmen yelling out orders)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1378 StartTime="6776724" EndTime="6778301" PlainText="Sir!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1379 StartTime="6778350" EndTime="6780841" PlainText="We are swung out and ready, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1380 StartTime="6780895" EndTime="6785687" PlainText="Hadn't we better get the women and children into the boats, sir?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1381 StartTime="6787568" EndTime="6789359" PlainText="Yes, we..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1382 StartTime="6789403" EndTime="6790683" PlainText="Sir?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1383 StartTime="6793282" EndTime="6795571" PlainText="Women and children first." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1384 StartTime="6795618" EndTime="6797444" PlainText="Yes." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1385 StartTime="6797494" EndTime="6799570" PlainText="Yes, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1386 StartTime="6801248" EndTime="6804866" PlainText="Ladies and gentlemen, your attention, please!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1387 StartTime="6804919" EndTime="6807789" PlainText="Step this way, please! That's right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1388 StartTime="6807838" EndTime="6809961" PlainText="Come towards me!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1389 StartTime="6810007" EndTime="6811916" PlainText="Thank you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1390 StartTime="6811967" EndTime="6812963" PlainText="Good." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1391 StartTime="6813052" EndTime="6817512" PlainText="For the time being I shall require only women and children." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1392 StartTime="6817556" EndTime="6819632" PlainText="Right here." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1393 StartTime="6819683" EndTime="6821925" PlainText="like the Captain said,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1394 StartTime="6821977" EndTime="6824764" PlainText="...nice and cheery so there's no panic." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1395 StartTime="6824813" EndTime="6826853" PlainText="''Wedding Dance.''" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1396 StartTime="6834240" EndTime="6837240" PlainText="Lifebelts on! Put your Lifebelts on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1397 StartTime="6837284" EndTime="6838862" PlainText="Put your Lifebelts on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1398 StartTime="6838911" EndTime="6842446" PlainText="Here, put your lifebelt on. Here, come on..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1399 StartTime="6848254" EndTime="6851124" PlainText="It isn't time to go up to the boats yet." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1400 StartTime="6851173" EndTime="6853213" PlainText="Please stay calm." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1401 StartTime="6853259" EndTime="6857091" PlainText="look, please make sure you've got your Lifebelts on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1402 StartTime="6857137" EndTime="6859463" PlainText="Women and children to the front." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1403 StartTime="6859515" EndTime="6861591" PlainText="What are we doing, Mummy?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1404 StartTime="6861642" EndTime="6866637" PlainText="When the first-class people are in the boats, they'll start with us..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1405 StartTime="6866689" EndTime="6868598" PlainText="...and we'll want to be ready." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1406 StartTime="6868649" EndTime="6870855" PlainText="(men arguing)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1407 StartTime="6870901" EndTime="6873024" PlainText="Go and get some help." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1408 StartTime="6873070" EndTime="6875822" PlainText="Lower away! left and right together!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1409 StartTime="6875864" EndTime="6877323" PlainText="Steady!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1410 StartTime="6877366" EndTime="6879572" PlainText="Both sides together!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1411 StartTime="6879618" EndTime="6881029" PlainText="Steady!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1412 StartTime="6881078" EndTime="6882537" PlainText="Steady!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1413 StartTime="6882580" EndTime="6884738" PlainText="Steady!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1414 StartTime="6884790" EndTime="6886948" PlainText="Stop! Stop!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1415 StartTime="6887001" EndTime="6888329" PlainText="(screaming)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1416 StartTime="6888377" EndTime="6889705" PlainText="Hold the left side!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1417 StartTime="6889753" EndTime="6892589" PlainText="Right side only! Right side only!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1418 StartTime="6892631" EndTime="6894090" PlainText="Right side only!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1419 StartTime="6894133" EndTime="6895592" PlainText="Hold the left side!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1420 StartTime="6895634" EndTime="6898256" PlainText="Right side down! Lower away together!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1421 StartTime="6899972" EndTime="6902048" PlainText="Steady, lads!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1422 StartTime="6949605" EndTime="6953472" PlainText="You know, I do believe this ship may sink." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1423 StartTime="6953567" EndTime="6958941" PlainText="I've been asked to give you this small token of our appreciation." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1424 StartTime="6962159" EndTime="6964864" PlainText="Compliments of Mr. Caledon Hockley." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1425 StartTime="6971085" EndTime="6974418" PlainText="Come on, sister, you heard the man. Into the boat." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1426 StartTime="6974463" EndTime="6979920" PlainText="- Any room for a gentleman, gentlemen? - Only women at this time, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1427 StartTime="6979969" EndTime="6984132" PlainText="Will the lifeboats be seated according to class?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1428 StartTime="6985641" EndTime="6988595" PlainText="I hope they're not too crowded." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1429 StartTime="6988644" EndTime="6992594" PlainText="Oh, Mother... Shut up! Don't you understand?!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1430 StartTime="6992648" EndTime="6997274" PlainText="The water is freezing and there aren't enough boats! Not enough by half." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1431 StartTime="6997319" EndTime="7000854" PlainText="Half the people on this ship are going to die." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1432 StartTime="7000906" EndTime="7003029" PlainText="Not the better half." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1433 StartTime="7003075" EndTime="7005613" PlainText="Come on, Ruth, get in the boat." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1434 StartTime="7005661" EndTime="7008448" PlainText="First-class seats are right up here." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1435 StartTime="7008497" EndTime="7012744" PlainText="It's a pity I didn't keep that drawing. It'll be worth more by morning." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1436 StartTime="7012793" EndTime="7016791" PlainText="(Crewman) Women and children towards the front." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1437 StartTime="7016839" EndTime="7019081" PlainText="You unimaginable bastard." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1438 StartTime="7020009" EndTime="7024469" PlainText="(Molly) Come on, Rose, darling. There's plenty of room for you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1439 StartTime="7024513" EndTime="7028725" PlainText="- Come on, Rose. You're next. - Come into the boat, Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1440 StartTime="7029602" EndTime="7031179" PlainText="(Cal) Come." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1441 StartTime="7031228" EndTime="7033102" PlainText="Rose!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1442 StartTime="7033939" EndTime="7036015" PlainText="Get into the boat!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1443 StartTime="7036066" EndTime="7038142" PlainText="Rose..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1444 StartTime="7038569" EndTime="7040561" PlainText="Goodbye, Mother." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1445 StartTime="7042323" EndTime="7043983" PlainText="Rose?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1446 StartTime="7044033" EndTime="7046654" PlainText="Where are you going?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1447 StartTime="7046702" EndTime="7048659" PlainText="To him?!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1448 StartTime="7048704" EndTime="7051112" PlainText="To be a whore to a gutter rat?!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1449 StartTime="7051165" EndTime="7053952" PlainText="I'd rather be his whore than your wife!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1450 StartTime="7056212" EndTime="7057789" PlainText="No... No!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1451 StartTime="7058964" EndTime="7061253" PlainText="I said no!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1452 StartTime="7061300" EndTime="7063091" PlainText="(Ruth) Rose!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1453 StartTime="7063135" EndTime="7065128" PlainText="Please stop!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1454 StartTime="7065179" EndTime="7068263" PlainText="- And Lower away! - Rose!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1455 StartTime="7068307" EndTime="7070715" PlainText="- Man the tiller! - No, wait!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1456 StartTime="7070768" EndTime="7073140" PlainText="Rose!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1457 StartTime="7073187" EndTime="7075393" PlainText="Hold the left side there!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1458 StartTime="7078317" EndTime="7079480" PlainText="Help!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1459 StartTime="7079526" EndTime="7082730" PlainText="Can anybody hear me!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1460 StartTime="7082780" EndTime="7085816" PlainText="Hello, help me!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1461 StartTime="7085866" EndTime="7087942" PlainText="Help me!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1462 StartTime="7089161" EndTime="7091735" PlainText="Help me! Can anybody hear me!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1463 StartTime="7091789" EndTime="7094494" PlainText="Somebody help me!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1464 StartTime="7095876" EndTime="7097952" PlainText="Mr. Andrews!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1465 StartTime="7100589" EndTime="7102878" PlainText="Check the starboard corridor." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1466 StartTime="7102925" EndTime="7106128" PlainText="Madam, please, put on a lifebelt." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1467 StartTime="7106178" EndTime="7110425" PlainText="Lucy, for God's sake, put on your lifebelt. Set a good example." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1468 StartTime="7110474" EndTime="7111589" PlainText="Anyone in here?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1469 StartTime="7111642" EndTime="7116434" PlainText="Mr. Andrews, thank God! Where would they take someone under arrest?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1470 StartTime="7116480" EndTime="7119267" PlainText="You have to get to a boat right away." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1471 StartTime="7119316" EndTime="7123812" PlainText="I'm doing this with or without your help, but without will take longer." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1472 StartTime="7124655" EndTime="7130242" PlainText="Take the elevator to the very bottom. Go left down the crewmen's passage." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1473 StartTime="7130286" EndTime="7134579" PlainText="Go right and left again at the stairs. You’ll come to a corridor." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1474 StartTime="7138502" EndTime="7140578" PlainText="This could be bad." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1475 StartTime="7140629" EndTime="7142005" PlainText="(water gurgling)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1476 StartTime="7144675" EndTime="7146418" PlainText="Oh, shit." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1477 StartTime="7146468" EndTime="7148046" PlainText="Oh, shit!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1478 StartTime="7152683" EndTime="7154261" PlainText="Excuse me!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1479 StartTime="7154310" EndTime="7157429" PlainText="- (Crewman) The lifts are closed. - I do not care..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1480 StartTime="7157479" EndTime="7158938" PlainText="The lifts are..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1481 StartTime="7158981" EndTime="7163192" PlainText="I'm sorry, miss, but the lifts are closed." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1482 StartTime="7163235" EndTime="7167399" PlainText="I'm through being polite, goddamn it! Now take me down!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1483 StartTime="7167698" EndTime="7169109" PlainText="''E'' deck." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1484 StartTime="7172828" EndTime="7175449" PlainText="Come on... Come on, come on..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1485 StartTime="7192848" EndTime="7194342" PlainText="I'm going back up!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1486 StartTime="7194391" EndTime="7195589" PlainText="No!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1487 StartTime="7195643" EndTime="7196888" PlainText="No! No!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1488 StartTime="7196936" EndTime="7199177" PlainText="Miss, wait!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1489 StartTime="7200064" EndTime="7202934" PlainText="Come back! I'm going back up!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1490 StartTime="7202983" EndTime="7204228" PlainText="I'm going back up!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1491 StartTime="7213410" EndTime="7215486" PlainText="Crew passage..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1492 StartTime="7215829" EndTime="7217905" PlainText="Crew passage." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1493 StartTime="7237643" EndTime="7239221" PlainText="Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1494 StartTime="7242523" EndTime="7244314" PlainText="Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1495 StartTime="7248571" EndTime="7250029" PlainText="Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1496 StartTime="7250406" EndTime="7252482" PlainText="Rose!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1497 StartTime="7253325" EndTime="7254701" PlainText="Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1498 StartTime="7254743" EndTime="7256368" PlainText="Rose, I'm in here!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1499 StartTime="7256412" EndTime="7258404" PlainText="- I'm in here! - Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1500 StartTime="7258455" EndTime="7259866" PlainText="I'm in here!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1501 StartTime="7259915" EndTime="7261196" PlainText="- Jack! - Rose!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1502 StartTime="7261250" EndTime="7263041" PlainText="Jack! Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1503 StartTime="7263085" EndTime="7264164" PlainText="I'm sorry!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1504 StartTime="7264211" EndTime="7266287" PlainText="I'm sorry! I'm so sorry!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1505 StartTime="7267673" EndTime="7271623" PlainText="- Lovejoy put it in my pocket. - I know! I know, I know, I know!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1506 StartTime="7271677" EndTime="7274713" PlainText="Rose, you have to find a spare key, all right?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1507 StartTime="7274763" EndTime="7276258" PlainText="look in that cabinet." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1508 StartTime="7277558" EndTime="7280131" PlainText="It's a little silver one, Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1509 StartTime="7280185" EndTime="7281977" PlainText="Silver..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1510 StartTime="7282021" EndTime="7283729" PlainText="These are all brass!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1511 StartTime="7283772" EndTime="7286180" PlainText="Check right here, Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1512 StartTime="7289486" EndTime="7291194" PlainText="Rose..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1513 StartTime="7292239" EndTime="7294446" PlainText="How did you find out I didn't do it?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1514 StartTime="7294491" EndTime="7296567" PlainText="I didn't."
