FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1515 StartTime="7296785" EndTime="7299573" PlainText="I just realised I already knew." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1516 StartTime="7300915" EndTime="7303287" PlainText="Keep looking!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1517 StartTime="7310007" EndTime="7311632" PlainText="No key." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1518 StartTime="7311675" EndTime="7314712" PlainText="- There's no key! - Rose, Listen." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1519 StartTime="7314762" EndTime="7316635" PlainText="You have to go find help." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1520 StartTime="7316680" EndTime="7318258" PlainText="It'll be all right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1521 StartTime="7323646" EndTime="7325472" PlainText="I'll be right back." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1522 StartTime="7331904" EndTime="7334311" PlainText="I'll just wait here." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1523 StartTime="7347586" EndTime="7350042" PlainText="Hello, is there anyone here?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1524 StartTime="7350464" EndTime="7352006" PlainText="Hello?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1525 StartTime="7352049" EndTime="7354718" PlainText="Is there anybody down here?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1526 StartTime="7355261" EndTime="7357253" PlainText="We need help! Hello!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1527 StartTime="7357304" EndTime="7359131" PlainText="Damn it!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1528 StartTime="7366355" EndTime="7370400" PlainText="Can anybody hear me! Please! Hello! Hello!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1529 StartTime="7371193" EndTime="7373102" PlainText="Oh, thank God!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1530 StartTime="7373153" EndTime="7377151" PlainText="I need your help. There's a man back here and... Wait!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1531 StartTime="7381870" EndTime="7383828" PlainText="Hello?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1532 StartTime="7394300" EndTime="7396376" PlainText="(loud rumbling)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1533 StartTime="7397428" EndTime="7399504" PlainText="(panting)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1534 StartTime="7408188" EndTime="7409896" PlainText="Hello?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1535 StartTime="7409940" EndTime="7414686" PlainText="- Miss, you shouldn’t be here now. - Please, I need your help." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1536 StartTime="7414737" EndTime="7417821" PlainText="There is a man down here and he is trapped!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1537 StartTime="7417865" EndTime="7419988" PlainText="- No need to panic. - I'm not panicking!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1538 StartTime="7420034" EndTime="7423782" PlainText="You're going the wrong way! let go of me! Listen!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1539 StartTime="7429043" EndTime="7430869" PlainText="To hell with you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1540 StartTime="7433130" EndTime="7435206" PlainText="(ship creaking)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1541 StartTime="7450397" EndTime="7452473" PlainText="(crewman shouting orders)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1542 StartTime="7453651" EndTime="7455727" PlainText="Lower away!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1543 StartTime="7462159" EndTime="7464235" PlainText="Oh, God..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1544 StartTime="7468415" EndTime="7470491" PlainText="Oh, my God..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1545 StartTime="7489562" EndTime="7491222" PlainText="(gasps)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1546 StartTime="7518507" EndTime="7520215" PlainText="Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1547 StartTime="7520259" EndTime="7522050" PlainText="Rose!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1548 StartTime="7522094" EndTime="7524170" PlainText="Will this work?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1549 StartTime="7525097" EndTime="7527849" PlainText="I guess we'll find out. Come on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1550 StartTime="7530185" EndTime="7532308" PlainText="Wait, wait, wait, wait!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1551 StartTime="7532354" EndTime="7534228" PlainText="Try some practice swings." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1552 StartTime="7539403" EndTime="7543187" PlainText="Good. Try to hit the same mark again, Rose. You can do it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1553 StartTime="7549747" EndTime="7552320" PlainText="Okay. That's enough practice." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1554 StartTime="7552374" EndTime="7554201" PlainText="Come on, Rose. You can do it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1555 StartTime="7554251" EndTime="7558415" PlainText="Listen, just hit it really hard and really fast." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1556 StartTime="7560007" EndTime="7562842" PlainText="Wait! Open your hands up a little more." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1557 StartTime="7562885" EndTime="7565257" PlainText="- like that? - Right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1558 StartTime="7565304" EndTime="7568139" PlainText="Listen, Rose... I trust you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1559 StartTime="7572436" EndTime="7574429" PlainText="Go!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1560 StartTime="7579193" EndTime="7580735" PlainText="You did it!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1561 StartTime="7580778" EndTime="7583316" PlainText="Come on, let’s go!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1562 StartTime="7583364" EndTime="7585819" PlainText="Oh, shit, this is cold! Oh, shit!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1563 StartTime="7585866" EndTime="7587693" PlainText="Shit! Shit!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1564 StartTime="7592790" EndTime="7594249" PlainText="This is the way out." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1565 StartTime="7594291" EndTime="7598206" PlainText="We have to find another way. Come on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1566 StartTime="7598254" EndTime="7599368" PlainText="Pull!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1567 StartTime="7599421" EndTime="7601165" PlainText="(orchestra playing)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1568 StartTime="7601215" EndTime="7602329" PlainText="Pull!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1569 StartTime="7602383" EndTime="7604921" PlainText="Put your backs into it! Pull!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1570 StartTime="7609431" EndTime="7611056" PlainText="Pull!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1571 StartTime="7611100" EndTime="7615050" PlainText="Now there's something you don't see every day." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1572 StartTime="7636333" EndTime="7640663" PlainText="What's this luggage doing here? Get rid of it! We need the room!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1573 StartTime="7640713" EndTime="7642789" PlainText="(crewman giving orders)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1574 StartTime="7646051" EndTime="7647759" PlainText="Keep calm!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1575 StartTime="7648846" EndTime="7652381" PlainText="Move along there. Make more room. That's right. look sharp." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1576 StartTime="7654476" EndTime="7657430" PlainText="- Lovejoy! - She's not on the starboard side." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1577 StartTime="7657479" EndTime="7662188" PlainText="We're running out of time and this martinet isn't letting any men on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1578 StartTime="7662234" EndTime="7664808" PlainText="There's one on the other side letting men on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1579 StartTime="7664862" EndTime="7669571" PlainText="Then that's our play. We’ll need some insurance first. Come on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1580 StartTime="7669700" EndTime="7671574" PlainText="(banging)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1581 StartTime="7671619" EndTime="7673907" PlainText="This way. All the way down here." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1582 StartTime="7675915" EndTime="7679366" PlainText="Here! What do you think you're doing?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1583 StartTime="7679418" EndTime="7683285" PlainText="You’ll have to pay for that! That's White Star line property!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1584 StartTime="7683339" EndTime="7684667" PlainText="Shut up!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1585 StartTime="7686258" EndTime="7690801" PlainText="Will you hold the boat a moment? I just have to run back to my room..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1586 StartTime="7690846" EndTime="7693088" PlainText="Sit down!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1587 StartTime="7693140" EndTime="7697304" PlainText="Mr. Lightoller, why are the boats being launched half full?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1588 StartTime="7697353" EndTime="7701849" PlainText="- Not now, Mr. Andrews. - 20 or so in a boat built for 65..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1589 StartTime="7701899" EndTime="7704271" PlainText="...and I saw one boat with only 12! 12!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1590 StartTime="7704318" EndTime="7708944" PlainText="We weren't sure of the weight, Mr. Andrews. These boats may buckle." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1591 StartTime="7708989" EndTime="7710068" PlainText="Rubbish!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1592 StartTime="7710115" EndTime="7713116" PlainText="They were tested in Belfast with 70 men!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1593 StartTime="7713160" EndTime="7717537" PlainText="Now fill these boats, Mr. Lightoller, for God's sake, man!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1594 StartTime="7723045" EndTime="7726046" PlainText="I need more women and children, please!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1595 StartTime="7729969" EndTime="7733551" PlainText="(Crewman) Get back in there. This is not an exit." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1596 StartTime="7733597" EndTime="7737381" PlainText="- Get back in there. - This is not an exit!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1597 StartTime="7737810" EndTime="7741808" PlainText="You can't keep us locked in here! The ship's bloody sinking!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1598 StartTime="7741855" EndTime="7743932" PlainText="Bring forward the women!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1599 StartTime="7743983" EndTime="7746059" PlainText="Unlock the gates." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1600 StartTime="7746944" EndTime="7748901" PlainText="Women only!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1601 StartTime="7748946" EndTime="7750773" PlainText="No men!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1602 StartTime="7750823" EndTime="7752697" PlainText="No men!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1603 StartTime="7752741" EndTime="7754817" PlainText="(yelling)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1604 StartTime="7756662" EndTime="7758738" PlainText="Get back!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1605 StartTime="7761166" EndTime="7763159" PlainText="Lock the gates!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1606 StartTime="7763210" EndTime="7766128" PlainText="Get them back from those gates!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1607 StartTime="7766171" EndTime="7768164" PlainText="Don't touch the gates!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1608 StartTime="7770801" EndTime="7774300" PlainText="There are women and children down here!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1609 StartTime="7774346" EndTime="7776968" PlainText="let us up so we can have a chance!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1610 StartTime="7777016" EndTime="7779092" PlainText="Get back!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1611 StartTime="7781520" EndTime="7783145" PlainText="- Jack! - Tommy!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1612 StartTime="7783188" EndTime="7785477" PlainText="- Can we get out? - It's hopeless that way!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1613 StartTime="7785524" EndTime="7787268" PlainText="Whatever we do, we've gotta do it fast." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1614 StartTime="7787318" EndTime="7788776" PlainText="Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1615 StartTime="7788819" EndTime="7790444" PlainText="Fabrizio!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1616 StartTime="7790487" EndTime="7792361" PlainText="The boats are all gone." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1617 StartTime="7792406" EndTime="7795609" PlainText="- This whole place is flooding. - There is niente this way." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1618 StartTime="7795659" EndTime="7798364" PlainText="All right. let’s go this way. Come on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1619 StartTime="7803417" EndTime="7805326" PlainText="I make my own luck." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1620 StartTime="7805377" EndTime="7807417" PlainText="So do I." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1621 StartTime="7815304" EndTime="7816928" PlainText="Come on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1622 StartTime="7816972" EndTime="7819179" PlainText="No, come on. let’s go this way." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1623 StartTime="7821352" EndTime="7823428" PlainText="(speaking Arabic)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1624 StartTime="7827775" EndTime="7829435" PlainText="This way!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1625 StartTime="7829485" EndTime="7833435" PlainText="Go back to the main stairwell and everything will be sorted out there." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1626 StartTime="7833489" EndTime="7834864" PlainText="The hell it will!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1627 StartTime="7834907" EndTime="7836983" PlainText="It will get sorted out back there." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1628 StartTime="7837034" EndTime="7838445" PlainText="Go back to the main stairwell." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1629 StartTime="7838494" EndTime="7840901" PlainText="- Open the gate. - Go back..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1630 StartTime="7840955" EndTime="7844158" PlainText="- Open the gate now! - Go back down the main stairwell!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1631 StartTime="7846126" EndTime="7849377" PlainText="Goddamn it! Son of a bitch!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1632 StartTime="7849421" EndTime="7850916" PlainText="Open the damn gate!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1633 StartTime="7850965" EndTime="7853253" PlainText="Go back!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1634 StartTime="7855177" EndTime="7859341" PlainText="- Fabri, Tommy. Give me a hand here! - Move aside! Move aside!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1635 StartTime="7859390" EndTime="7861098" PlainText="Pull!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1636 StartTime="7861976" EndTime="7864052" PlainText="- Move aside! - Put that down!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1637 StartTime="7864144" EndTime="7865473" PlainText="Move aside!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1638 StartTime="7865521" EndTime="7868059" PlainText="- One! Two! - Stop that!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1639 StartTime="7868107" EndTime="7869352" PlainText="Three!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1640 StartTime="7871527" EndTime="7872606" PlainText="Again!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1641 StartTime="7874572" EndTime="7875651" PlainText="let’s go!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1642 StartTime="7877199" EndTime="7878528" PlainText="let’s go, Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1643 StartTime="7878617" EndTime="7882033" PlainText="You can't go up there! You can't do this!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1644 StartTime="7886667" EndTime="7889751" PlainText="(Lightoller) Keep order! Keep order here!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1645 StartTime="7889795" EndTime="7892998" PlainText="Back! Back! Back!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1646 StartTime="7894008" EndTime="7895253" PlainText="(screaming)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1647 StartTime="7897094" EndTime="7898553" PlainText="Hold on to her!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1648 StartTime="7900055" EndTime="7901431" PlainText="Pull her in!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1649 StartTime="7901473" EndTime="7904558" PlainText="Get back, I say!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1650 StartTime="7904602" EndTime="7906927" PlainText="Or I'll shoot you all like dogs!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1651 StartTime="7906979" EndTime="7909055" PlainText="Keep order here!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1652 StartTime="7909565" EndTime="7911723" PlainText="Keep order, I say." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1653 StartTime="7912192" EndTime="7915110" PlainText="Mr. Lowe, man this boat." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1654 StartTime="7919033" EndTime="7921571" PlainText="(Lowe) Is everybody all right?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1655 StartTime="7921619" EndTime="7923576" PlainText="Nobody panic." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1656 StartTime="7929084" EndTime="7931042" PlainText="(Crewman) Stay back!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1657 StartTime="7931086" EndTime="7934420" PlainText="- We're too late. - There are more boats at the front." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1658 StartTime="7934465" EndTime="7938249" PlainText="Stay with this one. Murdoch seems to be quite practical." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1659 StartTime="7938302" EndTime="7940211" PlainText="(women screaming)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1660 StartTime="7952524" EndTime="7954482" PlainText="(Lowe) Sit down!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1661 StartTime="7954985" EndTime="7957061" PlainText="Stay back, you lot." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1662 StartTime="7957154" EndTime="7960570" PlainText="Stay back! Stay back, the lot of you! Stay back!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1663 StartTime="7960616" EndTime="7961612" PlainText="(gunshots)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1664 StartTime="7961659" EndTime="7965822" PlainText="It's starting to fall apart. We don't have much time." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1665 StartTime="7966914" EndTime="7968990" PlainText="Mr. Murdoch?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1666 StartTime="7969124" EndTime="7970287" PlainText="Mr. Hockley..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1667 StartTime="7970376" EndTime="7971870" PlainText="You two, with me, now!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1668 StartTime="7971919" EndTime="7975869" PlainText="I'm a businessman, as you know, and I've a business proposition for you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1669 StartTime="7975923" EndTime="7979506" PlainText="(Crewman) Easy now! All together!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1670 StartTime="7979552" EndTime="7982588" PlainText="Lower away! Lower away!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1671 StartTime="7982638" EndTime="7984714" PlainText="(Jack) Come on, Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1672 StartTime="7987560" EndTime="7989636" PlainText="The boats are gone!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1673 StartTime="7993357" EndTime="7996228" PlainText="Colonel, are there any boats on that side?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1674 StartTime="7996277" EndTime="8000321" PlainText="No, miss, but there are a couple of boats all the way forward." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1675 StartTime="8006078" EndTime="8009945" PlainText="What's the use? Nobody's listening to us, anyway." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1676 StartTime="8009999" EndTime="8012916" PlainText="They don't Listen to us at dinner, either." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1677 StartTime="8012960" EndTime="8014999" PlainText="Come on, let’s play. Keep us warm." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1678 StartTime="8015045" EndTime="8016872" PlainText="''Orpheus''." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1679 StartTime="8017089" EndTime="8020921" PlainText="(playing fast music from ''Orpheus In The Underworld'')" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1680 StartTime="8020968" EndTime="8024337" PlainText="Music to drown by. Now I know I'm in first class!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1681 StartTime="8029518" EndTime="8033219" PlainText="- Where is everyone? - They're all still aft, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1682 StartTime="8035190" EndTime="8038227" PlainText="We have an understanding, then, Mr. Murdoch?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1683 StartTime="8048787" EndTime="8050863" PlainText="(everyone shouting)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1684 StartTime="8051999" EndTime="8054075" PlainText="(gunshots)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1685 StartTime="8054126" EndTime="8057376" PlainText="Women and children only!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1686 StartTime="8057421" EndTime="8059959" PlainText="Get back! Step back, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1687 StartTime="8060132" EndTime="8063168" PlainText="Come through, madam. This way. Step back, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1688 StartTime="8063219" EndTime="8065970" PlainText="You better check the other side." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1689 StartTime="8066013" EndTime="8067673" PlainText="Go!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1690 StartTime="8069433" EndTime="8074854" PlainText="(Murdoch) Any more women and children? Any children?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1691 StartTime="8074897" EndTime="8078597" PlainText="I found her on the other side waiting for a boat." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1692 StartTime="8078734" EndTime="8080145" PlainText="With him." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1693 StartTime="8080194" EndTime="8083894" PlainText="- Any more women and children? - They're all aboard." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1694 StartTime="8083948" EndTime="8086106" PlainText="Anyone else, then!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1695 StartTime="8086158" EndTime="8089112" PlainText="- Anyone else! - Hurry along." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1696 StartTime="8092790" EndTime="8094829" PlainText="Stand by the falls." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1697 StartTime="8094875" EndTime="8097960" PlainText="Oh, goddamn it all to hell!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1698 StartTime="8099797" EndTime="8101256" PlainText="Shit!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1699 StartTime="8101298" EndTime="8103090" PlainText="Fire!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1700 StartTime="8103133" EndTime="8105885" PlainText="Sir! Sir, you can't go through here." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1701 StartTime="8105928" EndTime="8108004" PlainText="Sir, you can't go through." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1702 StartTime="8109390" EndTime="8112011" PlainText="Yes, yes, splendid. Right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1703 StartTime="8113102" EndTime="8114845" PlainText="Right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1704 StartTime="8115354" EndTime="8118225" PlainText="(Murdoch) Prepare to Lower!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1705 StartTime="8120276" EndTime="8122352" PlainText="Ready on the left." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1706 StartTime="8127199" EndTime="8129275" PlainText="Take them down." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1707 StartTime="8133664" EndTime="8135740" PlainText="Keep it steady." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1708 StartTime="8137084" EndTime="8139789" PlainText="Both sides together. Steady..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1709 StartTime="8140170" EndTime="8142412" PlainText="Keep it steady." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1710 StartTime="8142715" EndTime="8144209" PlainText="Give her to me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1711 StartTime="8144300" EndTime="8145462" PlainText="Daddy..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1712 StartTime="8145634" EndTime="8149086" PlainText="It'll be fine, darling. Don't you worry." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1713 StartTime="8149221" EndTime="8152721" PlainText="It's goodbye for a little while. Only a little while." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1714 StartTime="8152766" EndTime="8157594" PlainText="There's another boat for daddies. This one's for mummies and children." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1715 StartTime="8157646" EndTime="8160316" PlainText="Hold mummy's hand and be a good girl." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1716 StartTime="8160357" EndTime="8163691" PlainText="- I'm not going without you. - You have to... Now!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1717 StartTime="8163736" EndTime="8164767" PlainText="No, Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1718 StartTime="8164820" EndTime="8167607" PlainText="- Get in the boat, Rose. - No, Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1719 StartTime="8167698" EndTime="8169572" PlainText="Get on the boat!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1720 StartTime="8169617" EndTime="8172072" PlainText="Yes, get on the boat, Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1721 StartTime="8174246" EndTime="8177615" PlainText="My God, look at you. You look a fright!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1722 StartTime="8177666" EndTime="8179291" PlainText="Here." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1723 StartTime="8180294" EndTime="8182168" PlainText="Put this on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1724 StartTime="8182213" EndTime="8183837" PlainText="Come." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1725 StartTime="8188052" EndTime="8192132" PlainText="- Go on. I'll get the next one. - No! Not without you!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1726 StartTime="8192223" EndTime="8196434" PlainText="I'll be fine. I'm a survivor, all right? Don't worry about me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1727 StartTime="8196477" EndTime="8198019" PlainText="Now go on, get on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1728 StartTime="8198062" EndTime="8201976" PlainText="I have an arrangement with an officer on the ship." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1729 StartTime="8202024" EndTime="8204396" PlainText="Jack and I can get off safely." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1730 StartTime="8204443" EndTime="8205606" PlainText="See?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1731 StartTime="8205653" EndTime="8208654" PlainText="- Got my own boat to catch. - Hurry!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1732 StartTime="8208697" EndTime="8210322" PlainText="They're almost full." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1733 StartTime="8211742" EndTime="8213818" PlainText="Step aboard, miss." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1734 StartTime="8215329" EndTime="8217618" PlainText="Step aboard, please." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1735 StartTime="8217706" EndTime="8220873" PlainText="(Crewman) Keep back. Keep back, I say!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1736 StartTime="8221585" EndTime="8223661" PlainText="Clear the row, please." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1737 StartTime="8225381" EndTime="8226661" PlainText="Lower away!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1738 StartTime="8230135" EndTime="8231511" PlainText="(Crewman) Slowly..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1739 StartTime="8231762" EndTime="8233920" PlainText="Keep going, keep going." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1740 StartTime="8234223" EndTime="8236796" PlainText="And Lower away evenly, lads." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1741 StartTime="8236934" EndTime="8240054" PlainText="Easy... Lower away." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1742 StartTime="8240104" EndTime="8241847" PlainText="You're a good liar." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1743 StartTime="8241897" EndTime="8243973" PlainText="Almost as good as you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1744 StartTime="8244066" EndTime="8247517" PlainText="(Crewman) Easy now... and Lower away." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1745 StartTime="8248696" EndTime="8252859" PlainText="There's no, uh... There's no arrangement, is there?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1746 StartTime="8252908" EndTime="8255067" PlainText="No, there is." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1747 StartTime="8255452" EndTime="8258157" PlainText="Not that you'll benefit much from it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1748 StartTime="8259915" EndTime="8261991" PlainText="I always win, Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1749 StartTime="8262126" EndTime="8264202" PlainText="One way or another." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1750 StartTime="8266714" EndTime="8268790" PlainText="(Crewman) Easy..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1751 StartTime="8270259" EndTime="8272252" PlainText="Even, lads." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1752 StartTime="8272344" EndTime="8274835" PlainText="Keep going, keep going." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1753 StartTime="8322478" EndTime="8323474" PlainText="Rose!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1754 StartTime="8323520" EndTime="8325727" PlainText="(passengers yelling)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1755 StartTime="8326565" EndTime="8328807" PlainText="- Stop her! - What are you doing!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1756 StartTime="8328859" EndTime="8330816" PlainText="Stop her!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1757 StartTime="8330861" EndTime="8332320" PlainText="No!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1758 StartTime="8350339" EndTime="8352213" PlainText="Rose!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1759 StartTime="8354760" EndTime="8357880" PlainText="You're so stupid! Why'd you do that?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1760 StartTime="8357930" EndTime="8360006" PlainText="You're so stupid, Rose!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1761 StartTime="8361225" EndTime="8363514" PlainText="Why did you do that? Why?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1762 StartTime="8363936" EndTime="8365975" PlainText="You jump, I jump, right?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1763 StartTime="8367022" EndTime="8368682" PlainText="Right." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1764 StartTime="8370943" EndTime="8373315" PlainText="Oh, God, I couldn’t go." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1765 StartTime="8373362" EndTime="8375438" PlainText="I couldn’t go, Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1766 StartTime="8375489" EndTime="8378656" PlainText="It's all right. We’ll think of something." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1767 StartTime="8378701" EndTime="8381073" PlainText="(Rose) At least I'm with you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1768 StartTime="8393924" EndTime="8395122" PlainText="Come on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1769 StartTime="8396886" EndTime="8398296" PlainText="Come on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1770 StartTime="8398345" EndTime="8400552" PlainText="Come on! Move!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1771 StartTime="8406812" EndTime="8408390" PlainText="Come on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1772 StartTime="8415654" EndTime="8417113" PlainText="Move!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1773 StartTime="8423954" EndTime="8426955" PlainText="Come on, Rose. Come on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1774 StartTime="8426999" EndTime="8427781" PlainText="(gunshot)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1775 StartTime="8427833" EndTime="8429909" PlainText="Rose, come on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1776 StartTime="8431795" EndTime="8432827" PlainText="Move, Rose!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1777 StartTime="8435758" EndTime="8436671" PlainText="Go!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1778 StartTime="8443098" EndTime="8445768" PlainText="(creaking)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1779 StartTime="8447519" EndTime="8451303" PlainText="I hope you enjoy your time together!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1780 StartTime="8462201" EndTime="8464075" PlainText="(laughter)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1781 StartTime="8464411" EndTime="8466902" PlainText="What could possibly be funny?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1782 StartTime="8468082" EndTime="8470751" PlainText="I put the diamond in the coat..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1783 StartTime="8472586" EndTime="8475077" PlainText="...and I put the coat on her!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1784 StartTime="8475631" EndTime="8477339" PlainText="Come on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1785 StartTime="8491855" EndTime="8494643" PlainText="(child crying)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1786 StartTime="8497570" EndTime="8500357" PlainText="(walling)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1787 StartTime="8500531" EndTime="8502607" PlainText="We can't leave him." Come back!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1792 StartTime="8546035" EndTime="8547826" PlainText="Go!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1793 StartTime="8564386" EndTime="8565929" PlainText="Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1794 StartTime="8565971" EndTime="8567430" PlainText="Rose!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1795 StartTime="8579652" EndTime="8581443" PlainText="This way!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1796 StartTime="8589828" EndTime="8591536" PlainText="Come on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1797 StartTime="8591705" EndTime="8593413" PlainText="Give me your hand." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1798 StartTime="8602800" EndTime="8604543" PlainText="Oh, God!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1799 StartTime="8607846" EndTime="8609341" PlainText="Help!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1800 StartTime="8614520" EndTime="8616394" PlainText="(Rose) Help!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1801 StartTime="8618357" EndTime="8622106" PlainText="- Wait, sir! Open the gate, please! - Help us, please!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1802 StartTime="8622152" EndTime="8623611" PlainText="Help us!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1803 StartTime="8623654" EndTime="8624982" PlainText="Please!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1804 StartTime="8625072" EndTime="8626187" PlainText="Please!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1805 StartTime="8626323" EndTime="8627817" PlainText="Bloody hell!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1806 StartTime="8631203" EndTime="8632697" PlainText="Hurry!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1807 StartTime="8633914" EndTime="8636405" PlainText="Come on! Come on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1808 StartTime="8636458" EndTime="8638118" PlainText="- Go! - Jesus..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1809 StartTime="8638168" EndTime="8640541" PlainText="- Please! - Come on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1810 StartTime="8640588" EndTime="8642046" PlainText="Hurry!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1811 StartTime="8642089" EndTime="8643714" PlainText="Come on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1812 StartTime="8648137" EndTime="8650295" PlainText="I'm sorry, I dropped the keys!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1813 StartTime="8651390" EndTime="8653466" PlainText="Wait! Please!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1814 StartTime="8653809" EndTime="8656644" PlainText="Don't leave! Please! Get more help!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1815 StartTime="8674955" EndTime="8677707" PlainText="I got 'em! Which one is it, Rose?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1816 StartTime="8677750" EndTime="8680288" PlainText="The sharp one, try the sharp one." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1817 StartTime="8680419" EndTime="8681582" PlainText="Hurry, Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1818 StartTime="8685507" EndTime="8687167" PlainText="Oh, no!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1819 StartTime="8687259" EndTime="8688801" PlainText="Hurry, Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1820 StartTime="8691263" EndTime="8693339" PlainText="It's stuck!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1821 StartTime="8694183" EndTime="8696259" PlainText="Hurry, Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1822 StartTime="8702233" EndTime="8705732" PlainText="I got it! I got it! Go! Go, Rose!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1823 StartTime="8705778" EndTime="8707320" PlainText="Go! Go!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1824 StartTime="8716997" EndTime="8718278" PlainText="Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1825 StartTime="8719041" EndTime="8721710" PlainText="Jack! Come on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1826 StartTime="8723295" EndTime="8725502" PlainText="Move! Move!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1827 StartTime="8732471" EndTime="8734547" PlainText="(Crewman) Keep on rocking!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1828 StartTime="8734598" EndTime="8737089" PlainText="Oars in place! Get an oar under it!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1829 StartTime="8737142" EndTime="8740476" PlainText="Women and children only, damn you!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1830 StartTime="8740521" EndTime="8743226" PlainText="(Crewman) Hold it! Hold it!" Then get the falls hooked up!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1833 StartTime="8768132" EndTime="8770208" PlainText="(Murdoch) Stay back!"
