FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1858 StartTime="8866397" EndTime="8868639" PlainText="- I have a child! - Clear a path here!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1859 StartTime="8868732" EndTime="8871484" PlainText="Please, I have a child!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1860 StartTime="8871527" EndTime="8874563" PlainText="Please, I'm all she has in the world." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1861 StartTime="8874613" EndTime="8876689" PlainText="Go on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1862 StartTime="8877575" EndTime="8879235" PlainText="Step back!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1863 StartTime="8879285" EndTime="8881361" PlainText="Here, give her to me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1864 StartTime="8884623" EndTime="8886663" PlainText="Give her here." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1865 StartTime="8886709" EndTime="8887989" PlainText="(child walling)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1866 StartTime="8888043" EndTime="8889953" PlainText="There, there." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1867 StartTime="8893173" EndTime="8894965" PlainText="Wait, wait, wait." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1868 StartTime="8895009" EndTime="8896882" PlainText="Mr. Andrews..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1869 StartTime="8898137" EndTime="8899596" PlainText="Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1870 StartTime="8901223" EndTime="8903893" PlainText="Won't you even make a try for it?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1871 StartTime="8906353" EndTime="8911348" PlainText="I'm sorry that I didn't build you a stronger ship, young Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1872 StartTime="8911567" EndTime="8913275" PlainText="It's going fast." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1873 StartTime="8913319" EndTime="8915062" PlainText="We have to move." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1874 StartTime="8915112" EndTime="8916772" PlainText="Wait." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1875 StartTime="8918324" EndTime="8920400" PlainText="Good luck to you, Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1876 StartTime="8922119" EndTime="8923946" PlainText="And to you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1877 StartTime="8935132" EndTime="8939260" PlainText="Mr. Guggenheim... These are for you, Mr. Guggenheim." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1878 StartTime="8939303" EndTime="8940845" PlainText="No, thank you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1879 StartTime="8940971" EndTime="8945349" PlainText="We are dressed in our best and are prepared to go down as gentlemen." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1880 StartTime="8945392" EndTime="8947184" PlainText="But we would like a brandy." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1881 StartTime="8958572" EndTime="8960150" PlainText="Capitan." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1882 StartTime="8960199" EndTime="8962690" PlainText="Capitan, where should I go? Please..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1883 StartTime="8967373" EndTime="8969449" PlainText="(Crewman) Captain!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1884 StartTime="8969500" EndTime="8972169" PlainText="Captain... Sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1885 StartTime="8993065" EndTime="8996600" PlainText="(orchestra still playing)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1886 StartTime="9002366" EndTime="9005201" PlainText="Right... That's it, then." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1887 StartTime="9005244" EndTime="9008114" PlainText="Goodbye, Wally. Good luck." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1888 StartTime="9008163" EndTime="9010239" PlainText="So long, old chap." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1889 StartTime="9017131" EndTime="9020582" PlainText="(starts playing ''Nearer My God To Thee'')" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1890 StartTime="9084198" EndTime="9089441" PlainText="And so they lived happily together for 300 years..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1891 StartTime="9089495" EndTime="9092496" PlainText="...in the land of Tir Na Nog." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1892 StartTime="9092540" EndTime="9095743" PlainText="land of eternal youth and beauty." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1893 StartTime="9129827" EndTime="9132234" PlainText="There's no time!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1894 StartTime="9132288" EndTime="9135953" PlainText="Cut those falls! Cut 'em! Cut 'em if you have to!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1895 StartTime="9136000" EndTime="9139250" PlainText="I need a knife! I need a knife!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1896 StartTime="9141839" EndTime="9144164" PlainText="Cut her loose!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1897 StartTime="9155185" EndTime="9157178" PlainText="Cut those bloody falls!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1898 StartTime="9203984" EndTime="9209109" PlainText="Gentlemen, it has been a privilege playing with you tonight." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1899 StartTime="9269216" EndTime="9273166" PlainText="We have to stay on the ship as long as possible! Come on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1900 StartTime="9284106" EndTime="9286775" PlainText="(Jack) This way. Over the rail!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1901 StartTime="9288777" EndTime="9291315" PlainText="Come on, Rose. Jump!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1902 StartTime="9294033" EndTime="9295693" PlainText="Come on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1903 StartTime="9302082" EndTime="9303411" PlainText="(screaming)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1904 StartTime="9321602" EndTime="9323678" PlainText="(gasping)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1905 StartTime="9327608" EndTime="9330181" PlainText="(Jack) I got you. Jump!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1906 StartTime="9331612" EndTime="9333688" PlainText="I've got you, miss!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1907 StartTime="9334823" EndTime="9336483" PlainText="Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1908 StartTime="9337910" EndTime="9339618" PlainText="(Cal) Get back!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1909 StartTime="9343707" EndTime="9345914" PlainText="(cables snapping)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1910 StartTime="9348295" EndTime="9349837" PlainText="(metal groaning)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1911 StartTime="9369024" EndTime="9371100" PlainText="No! You’ll swamp us!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1912 StartTime="9374947" EndTime="9377319" PlainText="(screaming)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1913 StartTime="9383831" EndTime="9387034" PlainText="Though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1914 StartTime="9387084" EndTime="9390038" PlainText="You wanna walk a little faster through that valley?!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1915 StartTime="9412401" EndTime="9414061" PlainText="Row!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1916 StartTime="9414111" EndTime="9416187" PlainText="Pull together!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1917 StartTime="9435507" EndTime="9436836" PlainText="(screams)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1918 StartTime="9439386" EndTime="9441960" PlainText="Holy Mary, Mother of God,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1919 StartTime="9442014" EndTime="9445715" PlainText="...pray for us sinners now and at the hour of our death. Amen." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1920 StartTime="9445768" EndTime="9447262" PlainText="Hall Mary, full of grace..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1921 StartTime="9447311" EndTime="9449268" PlainText="This way." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1922 StartTime="9457238" EndTime="9458898" PlainText="Come on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1923 StartTime="9458948" EndTime="9460821" PlainText="Come on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1924 StartTime="9470000" EndTime="9472207" PlainText="I saw a new heaven and a new earth..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1925 StartTime="9472253" EndTime="9476546" PlainText="...when the first heaven and the first earth had passed away..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1926 StartTime="9476590" EndTime="9478915" PlainText="...and there was no more sea." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1927 StartTime="9484723" EndTime="9489017" PlainText="It'll be over soon. It'll all be over soon." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1928 StartTime="9493440" EndTime="9497485" PlainText="And he shall dwell with them and they shall be his people..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1929 StartTime="9497528" EndTime="9500233" PlainText="...and God himself shall be with them." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1930 StartTime="9502616" EndTime="9504525" PlainText="Jack,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1931 StartTime="9504577" EndTime="9507494" PlainText="...this is where we first met." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1932 StartTime="9513711" EndTime="9517293" PlainText="And God shall wipe away all the tears from their eyes." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1933 StartTime="9517339" EndTime="9519462" PlainText="And there shall be no more death." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1934 StartTime="9519508" EndTime="9522545" PlainText="Neither shall there be sorrow or crying." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1935 StartTime="9522595" EndTime="9526129" PlainText="Neither shall there be any more pain..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1936 StartTime="9526181" EndTime="9529467" PlainText="...for the former world has passed away." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1937 StartTime="9543240" EndTime="9545778" PlainText="Bloody pull faster, and pull!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1938 StartTime="9548996" EndTime="9551072" PlainText="(screaming)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1939 StartTime="9568974" EndTime="9570552" PlainText="Hang on, Miss Trudy!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1940 StartTime="9570601" EndTime="9572640" PlainText="(screaming)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1941 StartTime="9572811" EndTime="9574887" PlainText="(glass shattering)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1942 StartTime="9594542" EndTime="9595952" PlainText="(screams)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1943 StartTime="9599630" EndTime="9603213" PlainText="(Man) Help me! Please, save me!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1944 StartTime="9605344" EndTime="9606507" PlainText="(Woman) Help!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1945 StartTime="9606554" EndTime="9608630" PlainText="(Jack) Hold on real tight!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1946 StartTime="9609265" EndTime="9611257" PlainText="(distant screaming)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1947 StartTime="9611308" EndTime="9613384" PlainText="(woman sobbing)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1948 StartTime="9619358" EndTime="9624020" PlainText="(distant screaming)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1949 StartTime="9625239" EndTime="9626698" PlainText="God Almighty!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1950 StartTime="9634707" EndTime="9638076" PlainText="(Crewman) Get those breakers in! Keep 'em in!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1951 StartTime="9638210" EndTime="9640286" PlainText="(crackling)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1952 StartTime="9641922" EndTime="9643333" PlainText="(screams)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1953 StartTime="9643382" EndTime="9645458" PlainText="(people screaming)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1954 StartTime="9645509" EndTime="9647134" PlainText="(ship creaking)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1955 StartTime="9650806" EndTime="9653677" PlainText="(planks splitting)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1956 StartTime="9672661" EndTime="9674203" PlainText="(everyone screaming)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1957 StartTime="9716121" EndTime="9718197" PlainText="We have to move!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1958 StartTime="9723504" EndTime="9726540" PlainText="Give me your hand. I'll pull you over." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1959 StartTime="9726590" EndTime="9729260" PlainText="Give me your hand!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1960 StartTime="9729301" EndTime="9732386" PlainText="I've got you. I won't let go." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1961 StartTime="9732429" EndTime="9734920" PlainText="Come on, I've got you!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1962 StartTime="9744608" EndTime="9747894" PlainText="- What's happening, Jack? - I don't know!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1963 StartTime="9756954" EndTime="9759030" PlainText="- Hold on! - Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1964 StartTime="9759081" EndTime="9761868" PlainText="(Man) Help me, please!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1965 StartTime="9762001" EndTime="9763625" PlainText="Someone help me!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1966 StartTime="9763669" EndTime="9765745" PlainText="(people screaming)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1967 StartTime="9779059" EndTime="9780886" PlainText="(panting)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1968 StartTime="9782021" EndTime="9783764" PlainText="(screams)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1969 StartTime="9786525" EndTime="9789609" PlainText="(Woman) Please help! Help!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1970 StartTime="9800247" EndTime="9801706" PlainText="This is it!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1971 StartTime="9813552" EndTime="9816222" PlainText="(Rose) Oh, God! Oh, God!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1972 StartTime="9816263" EndTime="9818422" PlainText="Hold on!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1973 StartTime="9818641" EndTime="9821345" PlainText="Oh, God! Oh..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1974 StartTime="9833656" EndTime="9836028" PlainText="The ship is gonna suck us down." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1975 StartTime="9836075" EndTime="9838400" PlainText="Take a deep breath when I say." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1976 StartTime="9842748" EndTime="9846034" PlainText="Kick for the surface and keep kicking." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1977 StartTime="9846085" EndTime="9848955" PlainText="Do not let go of my hand." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1978 StartTime="9855135" EndTime="9858053" PlainText="We're gonna make it, Rose. Trust me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1979 StartTime="9858138" EndTime="9860427" PlainText="I trust you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1980 StartTime="9863143" EndTime="9866477" PlainText="Ready? Ready?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1981 StartTime="9866564" EndTime="9868355" PlainText="Now!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1982 StartTime="9900681" EndTime="9902839" PlainText="(screaming)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1983 StartTime="9903976" EndTime="9905885" PlainText="Jack! Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1984 StartTime="9905936" EndTime="9908012" PlainText="Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1985 StartTime="9909607" EndTime="9911231" PlainText="Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1986 StartTime="9911275" EndTime="9913351" PlainText="(everyone screaming)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1987 StartTime="9915905" EndTime="9917447" PlainText="Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1988 StartTime="9917615" EndTime="9919239" PlainText="Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1989 StartTime="9937301" EndTime="9940088" PlainText="Jack! Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1990 StartTime="9943807" EndTime="9944803" PlainText="No!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1991 StartTime="9946101" EndTime="9947726" PlainText="Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1992 StartTime="9947770" EndTime="9949809" PlainText="Rose!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1993 StartTime="9950189" EndTime="9952596" PlainText="Get off her! Get off her!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1994 StartTime="9955027" EndTime="9957565" PlainText="- Rose! - Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1995 StartTime="9957613" EndTime="9960104" PlainText="Swim, Rose! I need you to swim!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1996 StartTime="9963327" EndTime="9965533" PlainText="Keep swimming!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1997 StartTime="9969291" EndTime="9971996" PlainText="- It's so cold! - Swim, Rose!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1998 StartTime="9976757" EndTime="9979248" PlainText="Come on... here..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <1999 StartTime="9979593" EndTime="9981882" PlainText="Keep swimming... come on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2000 StartTime="9984306" EndTime="9986762" PlainText="Here, get on it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2001 StartTime="9986892" EndTime="9988968" PlainText="Get on top." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2002 StartTime="9995734" EndTime="9997810" PlainText="Come on, Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2003 StartTime="10007371" EndTime="10009114" PlainText="Stay on it, Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2004 StartTime="10009164" EndTime="10010623" PlainText="Jack..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2005 StartTime="10030436" EndTime="10032512" PlainText="You’ll be all right now." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2006 StartTime="10034690" EndTime="10036766" PlainText="You’ll be all right now." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2007 StartTime="10037818" EndTime="10039645" PlainText="(whistle blows)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2008 StartTime="10039695" EndTime="10041984" PlainText="(whistle)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2009 StartTime="10042990" EndTime="10045066" PlainText="(Crewman) Return..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2010 StartTime="10045117" EndTime="10046908" PlainText="...the boats!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2011 StartTime="10050080" EndTime="10054707" PlainText="The boats are coming back for us, Rose. Hold on just a bit longer." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2012 StartTime="10054752" EndTime="10058203" PlainText="They... had to row away from the suction..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2013 StartTime="10058255" EndTime="10060925" PlainText="...but... now they'll be coming back." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2014 StartTime="10060966" EndTime="10063884" PlainText="(Woman) Come back!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2015 StartTime="10063928" EndTime="10068554" PlainText="- For God's sake! - Please! Help us!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2016 StartTime="10068599" EndTime="10070390" PlainText="(faint cries in distance)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2017 StartTime="10070434" EndTime="10073055" PlainText="Come back! For God's sake!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2018 StartTime="10073145" EndTime="10078650" PlainText="You don't understand. If we go back, they'll swamp the boat!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2019 StartTime="10078692" EndTime="10083153" PlainText="- They'll pull us right down! - Knock it off. You're scaring me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2020 StartTime="10083197" EndTime="10085522" PlainText="Come on, girls, grab an oar." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2021 StartTime="10085574" EndTime="10089442" PlainText="Are you mad?! We're in the middle of the North Atlantic!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2022 StartTime="10089495" EndTime="10093362" PlainText="Do you people want to live or do you want to die!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2023 StartTime="10099713" EndTime="10102418" PlainText="I don't understand a one of you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2024 StartTime="10103676" EndTime="10106083" PlainText="What's the matter with you?!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2025 StartTime="10106136" EndTime="10108627" PlainText="It's your men out there!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2026 StartTime="10108681" EndTime="10113639" PlainText="- There's plenty of room for more. - There'll be one less on this boat..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2027 StartTime="10113686" EndTime="10117351" PlainText="...if you don't shut that hole in your face!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2028 StartTime="10117439" EndTime="10120939" PlainText="(woman in distance) Come back!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2029 StartTime="10131203" EndTime="10132863" PlainText="Take this one." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2030 StartTime="10132913" EndTime="10137908" PlainText="Bring in your oars over there. Tie these two boats together as well." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2031 StartTime="10141338" EndTime="10144957" PlainText="Now make sure that's tied up nice and tight." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2032 StartTime="10147428" EndTime="10150429" PlainText="Listen to me, men, we have to go back." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2033 StartTime="10150472" EndTime="10155715" PlainText="I want to transfer all the women from this boat into that boat." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2034 StartTime="10155769" EndTime="10158225" PlainText="let’s get some space there." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2035 StartTime="10159690" EndTime="10162181" PlainText="(distant moaning)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2036 StartTime="10165237" EndTime="10167562" PlainText="(shivering)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2037 StartTime="10167615" EndTime="10170284" PlainText="It's getting quiet." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2038 StartTime="10171493" EndTime="10175408" PlainText="It's just gonna take 'em a couple of minutes to get..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2039 StartTime="10175456" EndTime="10177911" PlainText="...the boats organised." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2040 StartTime="10180211" EndTime="10182748" PlainText="I don't know about you, but..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2041 StartTime="10182796" EndTime="10188004" PlainText="...I intend to write a strongly worded letter to the White Star line..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2042 StartTime="10188052" EndTime="10190128" PlainText="...about all this." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2043 StartTime="10190804" EndTime="10193924" PlainText="(distant moans and cries for help)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2044 StartTime="10196060" EndTime="10198348" PlainText="I love you, Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2045 StartTime="10204610" EndTime="10206686" PlainText="Don't you do that." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2046 StartTime="10207738" EndTime="10210941" PlainText="Don't you say your goodbyes. Not yet." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2047 StartTime="10211033" EndTime="10213073" PlainText="Do you understand me?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2048 StartTime="10213285" EndTime="10215361" PlainText="I'm so cold." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2049 StartTime="10215412" EndTime="10217370" PlainText="Listen, Rose..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2050 StartTime="10217414" EndTime="10220250" PlainText="You're gonna get out of here." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2051 StartTime="10220292" EndTime="10225583" PlainText="You're gonna go on, and you're gonna make lots of babies,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2052 StartTime="10225631" EndTime="10229000" PlainText="...and you're gonna watch 'em grow." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2053 StartTime="10229051" EndTime="10231127" PlainText="You're gonna die an old..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2054 StartTime="10231178" EndTime="10234512" PlainText="...an old lady warm in her bed." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2055 StartTime="10235224" EndTime="10237300" PlainText="Not here." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2056 StartTime="10237351" EndTime="10240850" PlainText="Not this night. Not like this." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2057 StartTime="10240896" EndTime="10243221" PlainText="Do you understand me?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2058 StartTime="10245734" EndTime="10247941" PlainText="I can't feel my body." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2059 StartTime="10249238" EndTime="10254908" PlainText="Winning that ticket was the best thing that ever happened to me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2060 StartTime="10255286" EndTime="10257362" PlainText="It brought me to you..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2061 StartTime="10258414" EndTime="10261284" PlainText="...and I'm thankful for that, Rose." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2062 StartTime="10261333" EndTime="10263409" PlainText="I'm thankful." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2063 StartTime="10264670" EndTime="10267457" PlainText="You must... You must..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2064 StartTime="10269049" EndTime="10271719" PlainText="You must do me this honour..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2065 StartTime="10273429" EndTime="10277343" PlainText="You must promise me that you'll survive,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2066 StartTime="10279393" EndTime="10281931" PlainText="...that you won't give up,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2067 StartTime="10281979" EndTime="10284387" PlainText="...no matter what happens,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2068 StartTime="10286775" EndTime="10289266" PlainText="...no matter how hopeless." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2069 StartTime="10292489" EndTime="10294565" PlainText="Promise me now, Rose,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2070 StartTime="10296577" EndTime="10299494" PlainText="...and never let go of that promise." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2071 StartTime="10300372" EndTime="10302448" PlainText="I promise." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2072 StartTime="10304126" EndTime="10306202" PlainText="Never let go." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2073 StartTime="10308672" EndTime="10310961" PlainText="I will never let go, Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2074 StartTime="10313469" EndTime="10316304" PlainText="I'll never let go." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2075 StartTime="10338702" EndTime="10341028" PlainText="(Crewman) Right ahead, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2076 StartTime="10343874" EndTime="10345950" PlainText="(Lowe) Oars!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2077 StartTime="10346001" EndTime="10348327" PlainText="Do you see any moving?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2078 StartTime="10348379" EndTime="10350667" PlainText="No, sir. None moving, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2079 StartTime="10350714" EndTime="10352790" PlainText="Check them." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2080 StartTime="10353384" EndTime="10355460" PlainText="Bring that oar up here." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2081 StartTime="10359640" EndTime="10361716" PlainText="Check them. Make sure." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2082 StartTime="10363310" EndTime="10365386" PlainText="These are dead, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2083 StartTime="10365437" EndTime="10367097" PlainText="Now give way." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2084 StartTime="10367147" EndTime="10369021" PlainText="Ahead easy." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2085 StartTime="10374655" EndTime="10377027" PlainText="Careful with your oars." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2086 StartTime="10377074" EndTime="10379150" PlainText="Don't hit them." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2087 StartTime="10380578" EndTime="10383578" PlainText="Is there anyone alive out there!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2088 StartTime="10384123" EndTime="10387243" PlainText="Can anyone hear me?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2089 StartTime="10388294" EndTime="10391248" PlainText="Is there anyone alive out there!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2090 StartTime="10397428" EndTime="10399504" PlainText="We waited too long." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2091 StartTime="10403058" EndTime="10406558" PlainText="We’ll, keep checking them! Keep looking!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2092 StartTime="10406604" EndTime="10409604" PlainText="Is there anyone alive out there!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2093 StartTime="10413235" EndTime="10415442" PlainText="Can anyone hear me!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2094 StartTime="10426165" EndTime="10430957" PlainText="(Rose singing softly)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2095 StartTime="10435633" EndTime="10439049" PlainText="â™ªAnd it's up she goes." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2096 StartTime="10439094" EndTime="10441467" PlainText="â™ª Up she goes." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2097 StartTime="10448145" EndTime="10451514" PlainText="(continues singing)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2098 StartTime="10469416" EndTime="10473628" PlainText="(Lowe's voice, garbled and slow)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2099 StartTime="10479051" EndTime="10480676" PlainText="Jack?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2100 StartTime="10484765" EndTime="10486805" PlainText="Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2101 StartTime="10489436" EndTime="10491762" PlainText="Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2102 StartTime="10498279" EndTime="10501315" PlainText="Jack... there's a boat." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2103 StartTime="10502116" EndTime="10503989" PlainText="Jack..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2104 StartTime="10514545" EndTime="10516336" PlainText="Jack?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2105 StartTime="10516755" EndTime="10518713" PlainText="Jack..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2106 StartTime="10519758" EndTime="10521834" PlainText="Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2107 StartTime="10524555" EndTime="10526631" PlainText="Jack!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2108 StartTime="10528434" EndTime="10531185" PlainText="There's a boat, Jack." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2109 StartTime="10533355" EndTime="10535431" PlainText="Jack?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2110 StartTime="10574230" EndTime="10576306" PlainText="Come back." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2111 StartTime="10576607" EndTime="10578350" PlainText="Come back!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2112 StartTime="10578400" EndTime="10580310" PlainText="(voices of searchers)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2113 StartTime="10580361" EndTime="10582437" PlainText="Come back!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2114 StartTime="10582947" EndTime="10584571" PlainText="Come back!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2115 StartTime="10584615" EndTime="10586691" PlainText="Come back!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2116 StartTime="10587618" EndTime="10590026" PlainText="Come back! Come back!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2117 StartTime="10591330" EndTime="10593239" PlainText="Hello!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2118 StartTime="10594625" EndTime="10597294" PlainText="Can anyone hear me!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2119 StartTime="10597378" EndTime="10599951" PlainText="There's nothing here, sir." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2120 StartTime="10601507" EndTime="10603583" PlainText="Come back!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2121 StartTime="10604343" EndTime="10606419" PlainText="Come back..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2122 StartTime="10613102" EndTime="10615178" PlainText="I'll never let go." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2123 StartTime="10615229" EndTime="10617305" PlainText="I promise." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2124 StartTime="10656103" EndTime="10658511" PlainText="(whistling)" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2125 StartTime="10659356" EndTime="10661432" PlainText="Come about!" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2126 StartTime="10682963" EndTime="10689880" PlainText="1,500 people went into the sea when Titanic sank from under us." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2127 StartTime="10691805" EndTime="10695755" PlainText="There were 20 boats floating nearby..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2128 StartTime="10696227" EndTime="10698800" PlainText="...and only one came back." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2129 StartTime="10699647" EndTime="10701473" PlainText="One." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2130 StartTime="10703192" EndTime="10706109" PlainText="Six were saved from the water,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2131 StartTime="10706153" EndTime="10708359" PlainText="...myself included." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2132 StartTime="10709114" EndTime="10714156" PlainText="Six... out of 1,500." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2133 StartTime="10716830" EndTime="10718906" PlainText="Afterward,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2134 StartTime="10719458" EndTime="10724369" PlainText="...the 700 people in the boats had nothing to do but wait." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2135 StartTime="10726131" EndTime="10729666" PlainText="Wait to die, wait to live..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2136 StartTime="10730719" EndTime="10733008" PlainText="Wait for an absolution..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2137 StartTime="10733055" EndTime="10735131" PlainText="...that would never come." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2138 StartTime="10797661" EndTime="10802122" PlainText="Sir, I don't think you'll find any of your people down here." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2139 StartTime="10802166" EndTime="10804242" PlainText="It's all steerage." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2140 StartTime="10805544" EndTime="10810336" PlainText="(Woman) His hair is reddish brown. Reddish brown and a white beard." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2141 StartTime="10810382" EndTime="10814510" PlainText="- Is there another passenger list? - There's no other list." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2142 StartTime="10814553" EndTime="10819014" PlainText="- Perhaps he's on another ship. - We're doing all we can, ma'am." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2143 StartTime="10841455" EndTime="10844373" PlainText="(Rose) That's the last time I ever saw him." FormattedText="{(Rose) That's the last time I ever saw him. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2144 StartTime="10844416" EndTime="10848496" PlainText="He married, of course, and inherited his millions." FormattedText="{He married, of course, and inherited his millions. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2145 StartTime="10848546" EndTime="10852045" PlainText="But the crash of '29 hit his interests hard..." FormattedText="{But the crash of '29 hit his interests hard... Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2146 StartTime="10852091" EndTime="10855424" PlainText="...and he put a pistol in his mouth that year." FormattedText="{...and he put a pistol in his mouth that year. Properties: FontColor: default BackGroundColor: default isBold: No isItalic: Yes isUnderlined: No}" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2147 StartTime="10855469" EndTime="10858304" PlainText="Or so I read." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2148 StartTime="10869650" EndTime="10872058" PlainText="Can I take your name, please, love?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2149 StartTime="10875239" EndTime="10877315" PlainText="Dawson." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2150 StartTime="10878617" EndTime="10880740" PlainText="Rose Dawson." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2151 StartTime="10880786" EndTime="10882862" PlainText="Thank you." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2152 StartTime="10889044" EndTime="10893790" PlainText="We never found anything on Jack. There's no record of him at all." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2153 StartTime="10893841" EndTime="10896758" PlainText="No, there wouldn’t be, would there?" FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2154 StartTime="10897094" EndTime="10900510" PlainText="And I've never spoken of him until now." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2155 StartTime="10900556" EndTime="10902632" PlainText="Not to anyone." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2156 StartTime="10902683" EndTime="10905304" PlainText="Not even your grandfather." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2157 StartTime="10905352" EndTime="10909101" PlainText="A woman's heart is a deep ocean of secrets." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2158 StartTime="10909607" EndTime="10913854" PlainText="But now you know there was a man named Jack Dawson..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2159 StartTime="10913903" EndTime="10916025" PlainText="...and that he saved me." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2160 StartTime="10916071" EndTime="10919772" PlainText="In every way that a person can be saved." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2161 StartTime="10921535" EndTime="10924287" PlainText="I don't even have a picture of him." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2162 StartTime="10926790" EndTime="10930539" PlainText="He exists now only in my memory." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2163 StartTime="10935257" EndTime="10939635" PlainText="(Man) Keldysh, Keldysh, Mir 2 on our way to the surface." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2164 StartTime="10954777" EndTime="10958276" PlainText="(Brock) I was saving this for when I found the diamond." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2165 StartTime="10967581" EndTime="10969657" PlainText="I'm sorry." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2166 StartTime="10972002" EndTime="10976581" PlainText="Three years I've thought of nothing except Titanic..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2167 StartTime="10977550" EndTime="10979626" PlainText="...but I never got it." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2168 StartTime="10982388" EndTime="10984795" PlainText="I never let it in." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2169 StartTime="11258706" EndTime="11263083" PlainText="â™ª Every night in my dreams..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2170 StartTime="11263294" EndTime="11265251" PlainText="â™ª ...I see you,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2171 StartTime="11265796" EndTime="11268085" PlainText="â™ª ...I feel you..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2172 StartTime="11268716" EndTime="11277221" PlainText="â™ª That is how I know you go on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2173 StartTime="11278309" EndTime="11282258" PlainText="â™ª Far across the distance..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2174 StartTime="11282897" EndTime="11287642" PlainText="â™ª And spaces between us..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2175 StartTime="11288319" EndTime="11295282" PlainText="â™ª You have come to show you go on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2176 StartTime="11297494" EndTime="11299119" PlainText="â™ª Near..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2177 StartTime="11300206" EndTime="11301830" PlainText="â™ª Far..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2178 StartTime="11302082" EndTime="11305748" PlainText="â™ª Wherever you are..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2179 StartTime="11306462" EndTime="11315964" PlainText="â™ª I believe that the heart does go on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2180 StartTime="11317306" EndTime="11321007" PlainText="â™ª Once more..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2181 StartTime="11321477" EndTime="11325012" PlainText="â™ª ...you open the door..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2182 StartTime="11325731" EndTime="11329729" PlainText="â™ª ...and you're here in my heart,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2183 StartTime="11330027" EndTime="11337358" PlainText="â™ª ...and my heart will go on and on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2184 StartTime="11339119" EndTime="11342738" PlainText="â™ª love can touch just one time..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2185 StartTime="11343541" EndTime="11348333" PlainText="â™ª ...and last for a lifetime..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2186 StartTime="11349004" EndTime="11354509" PlainText="â™ª ...and never let go till we're gone." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2187 StartTime="11358597" EndTime="11361931" PlainText="â™ª love was when I loved you..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2188 StartTime="11362977" EndTime="11367769" PlainText="â™ª One true time I hold to..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2189 StartTime="11368399" EndTime="11376904" PlainText="â™ª In my life we'll always go on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2190 StartTime="11377700" EndTime="11379360" PlainText="â™ª Near..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2191 StartTime="11379952" EndTime="11381612" PlainText="â™ª Far..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2192 StartTime="11381954" EndTime="11385786" PlainText="â™ª Wherever you are..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2193 StartTime="11386208" EndTime="11396173" PlainText="â™ª I believe that the heart does go on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2194 StartTime="11397386" EndTime="11400921" PlainText="â™ª Once more..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2195 StartTime="11401557" EndTime="11405507" PlainText="â™ª ...you open the door..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2196 StartTime="11405936" EndTime="11409934" PlainText="â™ª ...and you're here in my heart,..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2197 StartTime="11410274" EndTime="11419361" PlainText="â™ª ...and my heart will go on and on." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2198 StartTime="11436258" EndTime="11439923" PlainText="â™ª You're here..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2199 StartTime="11440679" EndTime="11444131" PlainText="â™ª There's nothing I fear..." FormattedText="{ Text isn't formatted }" Position="Bottom-Center" /> <2200 StartTime="11445017" EndTime="11453855" PlainText="â™ª And I know that my heart will go on."
